metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
This parameter is used to trck deployment telemetry info. Enabled by default
The unique guid for this workbook instance

    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | distinct id
)
    on id
| summarize VPNGWCount = count()
| extend HasNonZonalVPNGateways = iff(VPNGWCount > 0, "Yes", "No")
| project HasNonZonalVPNGateways","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources"}],"style":"pills","queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"AlwaysHidden","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"yes"},"name":"paramCheckVPNGateways"},{"type":11,"content":{"version":"LinkItem/1.0","style":"tabs","links":[{"id":"ca40468d-4518-43bf-ac6e-0a11d7331e12","cellValue":"SelectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Overview","subTarget":"Overview","style":"link"},{"id":"26b3c7ef-1a00-4a3f-a773-677f00db9343","cellValue":"SelectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Backup checks ","subTarget":"BCDR","style":"link"},{"id":"7486aa22-b0c2-492c-aa11-35d1f674736f","cellValue":"SelectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Security checks","subTarget":"Security","style":"link"},{"id":"3e67632d-fed6-40ad-8037-6f654a83e536","cellValue":"SelectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Monitor checks","subTarget":"Monitor","style":"link"},{"id":"f280fc2a-f42a-42a4-ad4b-be37ab3e8b48","cellValue":"SelectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Resiliency Zone Adoption checks","subTarget":"zoneAdoption","style":"link"}]},"name":"links - It is designed to help you quickly identify gaps, review recommendations, and track remediation progress across your subscriptions and resource groups.

## Workbook Objectives

* Evaluate your Azure resources against Microsoft best practices for reliability, security, and operational excellence.
* Surface actionable insights and recommendations to improve your cloud posture.
* Enable filtering by subscription, resource group, and tags for targeted analysis.
* Support export of findings for offline review and reporting.

> **Note:** This workbook is intended as a guidance tool. arameterItem/1.0","name":"p3v4Price","type":1,"value":"426.32","typeSettings":{"parameterType":1}},{"id":"p3mv4-price-param","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"p3mv4Price","type":1,"value":"852.64","typeSettings":{"parameterType":1}},{"id":"p4mv4-price-param","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"p4mv4Price","type":1,"value":"1705.28","typeSettings":{"parameterType":1}},{"id":"p5mv4-price-param","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"p5mv4Price","type":1,"value":"3410.56","typeSettings":{"parameterType":1}},{"id":"storage-price-gb-month-param","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"storagePricePerGbMonth","type":1,"value":"0.028","typeSettings":{"parameterType":1}},{"id":"change-rate-daily-param","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"changeRateDaily","type":1,"value":"1","typeSettings":{"parameterType":1}},{"id":"backup-agent-cost-param","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"backupAgentCost","type":1,"value":"10","typeSettings":{"parameterType":1}},{"id":"snapshot-retention-param","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"snapshotRetention","type":1,"value":"3","typeSettings":{"parameterType":1}},{"id":"snapshot-price-param","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"snapshotPrice","type":1,"value":"0.144","typeSettings":{"parameterType":1}},{"id":"defender-server-agent-param","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"defenderforServeragent","type":1,"value":"14.6","typeSettings":{"parameterType":1}}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"AlwaysHidden","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"yes"},"name":"cost-parameters"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// Zone Adoption Export - All Recommendations
(
    resources
    | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) and location in~ ({ZonalRegions}) and type in~ (
        'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines',
        'Microsoft.Compute/disks',
        'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls',
        'microsoft.network/applicationGateways',
        'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses',
        'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways',
        'microsoft.network/bastionhosts',
        'microsoft.network/loadbalancers',
        'microsoft.sql/servers/databases',
        'microsoft.cache/redis',
        'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers',
        'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers',
        'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts',
        'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes',
        'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets',
        'microsoft.apimanagement/service',
        'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces',
        'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces',
        'microsoft.web/serverfarms',
        'microsoft.containerregistry/registries',
        'microsoft.app/managedenvironments',
        'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults'
    )
    | extend ZoneConfigured = case(
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', not(isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) == 0),
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', tostring(sku.name) in ('Premium_ZRS', 'StandardSSD_ZRS'),
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', tostring(properties.sku.tier) contains 'AZ',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', tolower(tostring(sku.name)) != 'basic' and array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'microsoft.sql/servers/databases', name != 'master' and tobool(properties.zoneRedundant),
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', not(properties.zonalAllocationPolicy != 'Automatic' and (array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) <= 1 or isnull(zones))),
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode) == 'ZoneRedundant',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode) == 'ZoneRedundant',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', tostring(sku.name) endswith_cs 'ZRS',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 1,
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', not(tags has "aks-managed-orchestrator" or name startswith "aks-") and not(isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) <= 1),
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', not(isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) <= 1),
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', not(iff(tobool(properties.zoneRedundant) == true, true, false) == false),
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', not(tostring(properties.zoneRedundant) == "false"),
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', tostring(sku.name) != "Y1" and (tobool(properties.zoneRedundant) == false or (tostring(sku.tier) in~ ('PremiumV2', 'PremiumV3', 'PremiumV4', 'Isolated', 'IsolatedV2') and (isnull(properties.supportsZoneRedundancy) or not(tobool(properties.supportsZoneRedundancy))))),
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', not(location in~ ({ZonalRegions})),
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', not(tobool(properties.zoneRedundant)),
        type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', not(tostring(properties.storageModelType) == "ZoneRedundant" or tostring(properties.storageType) == "ZoneRedundant"),
        false
    )
    | where not(ZoneConfigured)
    | extend Recommendation = case(
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', 'Deploy VMs across Availability Zones',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', 'Use Azure Disks with Zone Redundant Storage',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', 'Enable multi-zone Application Gateway',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', 'Deploy Azure Firewall across multiple availability zones',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', 'Move to ZRS/GZRS storage',
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', case(
            tostring(sku.tier) in~ ('Free', 'Shared', 'Basic', 'Standard') or (tostring(sku.tier) == 'Premium' and not(tostring(sku.name) contains 'v')), 'Enable zone redundancy on App Service Plan',
            toint(sku.capacity) < 2, 'Enable zone redundancy on App Service Plan',
            'Enable zone redundancy on App Service Plan'
        ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', 'Use multi-zone AKS node pools',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', 'Enable ACR zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', case(
            tostring(sku.name) == 'Premium', 'Enable multi-zone API Management',
            'Enable multi-zone API Management'
        ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', 'Enable Service Bus zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', case(
            tostring(sku.tier) in ('Standard', 'Premium', 'Dedicated'), 'Enable Event Hub zone redundancy',
            'Enable Event Hub zone redundancy'
        ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', 'Enable Redis zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', 'Enable MySQL zone-redundant HA',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', 'Enable PostgreSQL zone-redundant HA',
        type =~ 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts', 'Enable Cosmos DB zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', 'Use zone-redundant Standard Load Balancer',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', 'Use AZ SKU Virtual Network Gateway',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/publicipaddresses', 'Create / convert to zone-redundant Public IP',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', 'Deploy Bastion host across zones',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', 'Review ANF multi-zone deployment',
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', 'Enable Container Apps env zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', 'Distribute VM Scale Set across zones',
        type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', 'Enable zone-redundant storage (ZRS) for Recovery Services Vault',
        ''
    )
    | where isnotempty(Recommendation)
    // Cost calculations for all services including yellow and red categories
    | extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = case(
        // Green Light Services (🟢 Cost Est.)
        // Azure Firewall - No additional cost for zone redundancy
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', "$0.00",
        // Application Gateway - Complex pricing with tiered data transfer costs
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', 
            strcat("$", tostring(round(
                (todouble({AppGWperhour}) * 730) + 
                (todouble({CapacityUnitperhour}) * 730) + 
                // Exact 5-tier data transfer calculation from original workbook
                case(
                    todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) <= 100, 0.0,  // First 100 GB free
                    todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) <= 10340, (todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) - 100) * todouble({dataTransferTier1Price}),  // Next 10 TB at $0.04/GB
                    todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) <= 51440, ((10340 - 100) * todouble({dataTransferTier1Price})) + ((todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) - 10340) * todouble({dataTransferTier2Price})),  // Next 40 TB at $0.08/GB
                    todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) <= 153840, ((10340 - 100) * todouble({dataTransferTier1Price})) + ((51440 - 10340) * todouble({dataTransferTier2Price})) + ((todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) - 51440) * todouble({dataTransferTier3Price})),  // Next 100 TB at $0.04/GB
                    // Over 153840 GB: First 100GB free + Next 10TB at tier1 + Next 40TB at tier2 + Next 100TB at tier3 + remainder at tier4
                    ((10340 - 100) * todouble({dataTransferTier1Price})) + ((51440 - 10340) * todouble({dataTransferTier2Price})) + ((153840 - 51440) * todouble({dataTransferTier3Price})) + ((todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) - 153840) * todouble({dataTransferTier4Price}))  // Next 350 TB at $0.065/GB
                ), 2))),
        // Public IP Addresses
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', strcat("$", tostring(round(todouble({PIPPerHour}) * 730, 2))),
        // VPN Gateway - Complex SKU-based pricing
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways',
            case(
                // Already AZ SKUs - no upgrade needed
                tostring(properties.sku.name) contains 'AZ', "$0.00",
                // Calculate complex cost for non-AZ SKUs
                strcat("$", tostring(round(
                    // Base gateway cost based on equivalent AZ SKU
                    case(
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) in~ ('Basic', 'Standard', 'HighPerformance', 'VpnGw1'), 153.30,  // VpnGw1AZ
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) =~ 'VpnGw2', 394.20,  // VpnGw2AZ
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) =~ 'VpnGw3', 1007.40, // VpnGw3AZ
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) =~ 'VpnGw4', 1686.30, // VpnGw4AZ
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) =~ 'VpnGw5', 2934.60, // VpnGw5AZ
                        153.30  // Default to VpnGw1AZ
                    ) +
                    // Additional S2S tunnel costs
                    case(
                        todouble({s2stunnels}) <= 10, 0.0,  // First 10 included
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) in~ ('Basic', 'Standard', 'HighPerformance', 'VpnGw1', 'VpnGw2', 'VpnGw3') and todouble({s2stunnels}) <= 30, 
                            (todouble({s2stunnels}) - 10) * 0.015 * 730,  // 11-30 tunnels
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) in~ ('VpnGw4', 'VpnGw5') and todouble({s2stunnels}) <= 100, 
                            (todouble({s2stunnels}) - 10) * 0.015 * 730,  // 11-100 tunnels
                        0.0  // Over limit
                    ) +
                    // Additional P2S connection costs
                    case(
                        todouble({P2SConnections}) <= 128, 0.0,  // First 128 included
                        (todouble({P2SConnections}) - 128) * 0.01 * 730  // Additional at $0.01/hour
                    ), 2)))
            ),
        // Bastion Hosts - No additional cost for zone redundancy
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', "$0.00",
        // Load Balancers - Exact tiered pricing calculation from original workbook
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', 
            strcat("$", tostring(round(
                // Tiered network rules pricing exactly matching original workbook
                case(
                    todouble({NetworkRules}) <= 5, todouble({NetworkRules}) * 0.025 * 730,  // First 5 rules at $0.025/hour
                    (5 * 0.025 * 730) + ((todouble({NetworkRules}) - 5) * 0.01 * 730)  // First 5 + additional at $0.01/hour
                ) + 
                // Data processing cost
                (todouble({DataProcessedGb}) * 0.005), 2))),
        // Managed Disks - Price difference calculation
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', 
            case(
                tostring(sku.name) == "Premium_LRS", strcat("$", tostring(round((todouble({premiumZrsPricePerGB}) - todouble({premiumSsdPricePerGB})) * toint(properties.diskSizeGB), 2))),
                tostring(sku.name) == "StandardSSD_LRS", strcat("$", tostring(round((todouble({standardSsdZrsPricePerGB}) - todouble({standardSsdPricePerGB})) * toint(properties.diskSizeGB), 2))),
                tostring(sku.name) == "Standard_LRS", strcat("$", tostring(round((todouble({standardSsdZrsPricePerGB}) - todouble({standardHddPricePerGB})) * toint(properties.diskSizeGB), 2))),
                "$0.00"
            ),
        // API Management - No additional cost for zone redundancy feature
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', "$0.00",
        // Service Bus - No additional cost
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', "$0.00",
        // Event Hub - No additional cost
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', "$0.00",
        // App Service Plans - No additional cost for zone redundancy feature
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', "$0.00",
        // Container Apps - No additional cost for zone redundancy feature
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', "$0.00",
        // VM Scale Sets - No additional cost for rebalancing
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', "$0.00",
        
        // Yellow Services (🟡 Cost Impact) - Percentage-based estimates
        // Virtual Machines - 100-200% increase: Deploy 2-3 instances across zones instead of single instance
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', "100-200% increase: Deploy 2-3 instances across zones instead of single instance",
        // AKS - Minimal network cost increase only, no compute cost change
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', "Minimal network cost increase - no compute cost change",
        // MySQL Flexible Servers - Zone-redundant HA typically 100% increase
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', "100% increase",
        
        // Red Services (🔴 No Cost Est.) - Complex pricing models
        // Redis Cache - Complex pricing based on tier and throughput
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', "Complex pricing - see Azure calculator",
        // PostgreSQL Flexible Servers - Variable based on configuration
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', "Variable - depends on configuration",
        // NetApp Files - Complex multi-tier pricing
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', "Complex capacity-based pricing",
        
        // Storage Accounts - Direct to Storage tab for detailed cost breakdown
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', "Cannot be aggregated, check the Storage tab",
        // Container Registry - Zone redundancy enabled automatically at no additional cost
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', "$0.00",
        // Recovery Services Vaults - ZRS may have minimal storage cost difference
        type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', "Minimal cost increase for ZRS backup storage - see Azure calculator",
        
        // All other services
        "NA"
    )
    | extend CostImpactCategory = case(
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', '🟡 Cost Impact',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', '🟢 Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', '🟢 Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', '🟢 Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', '🟡 Cost Impact',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', '🔴 No Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', '🟡 Cost Impact',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', '🔴 No Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts', '🟡 Cost Impact',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', '🟢 Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', '🟢 Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/publicipaddresses', '🟢 Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', '🔴 No Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', '� No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', '🟡 Cost Impact',
        '🔍 Review Required'
    )
    | extend ImplementationImpact = case(
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', 'Low',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', 'High',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', 'High',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', case(
            tostring(sku.tier) in~ ('Free', 'Shared', 'Basic', 'Standard') or (tostring(sku.tier) == 'Premium' and not(tostring(sku.name) contains 'v')), 'High',  // Requires tier upgrade
            toint(sku.capacity) < 2, 'Medium',  // Instance increase needed
            'Medium'  // Zone configuration only
        ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', 'Low',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', 'High',
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', case(
            tostring(sku.name) == 'Premium', 'Medium',
            'High'
        ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', 'High',  // Automatic migration by Microsoft
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', case(
            tostring(sku.tier) in ('Standard', 'Premium', 'Dedicated'), 'None',
            'Medium'
        ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts', 'Low',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', 'High',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/publicipaddresses', 'High',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', 'High',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', 'High',
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', 'High',
        'Medium'
    )
    | extend ImplementationComplexity = case(
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', 'Low',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', 'High',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', 'High',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', case(
            tostring(sku.tier) in~ ('Free', 'Shared', 'Basic', 'Standard') or (tostring(sku.tier) == 'Premium' and not(tostring(sku.name) contains 'v')), 'High',  // Requires tier upgrade
            'Medium'  // Zone configuration and instance management
        ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', 'High',
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', case(
            tostring(sku.name) == 'Premium', 'Medium',
            'High'
        ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', 'Low',  // Automatic migration by Microsoft
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', case(
            tostring(sku.tier) in ('Standard', 'Premium', 'Dedicated'), 'None',
            'Medium'
        ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts', 'Low',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/publicipaddresses', 'Low',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', 'High',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', 'Low',
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', 'Medium',
        type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', 'High',
        'Medium'
    )
    | extend Category = case(
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/publicipaddresses', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', 'Zone Adoption Checks',
        'Zone Adoption Checks'
    )
    | project 
        Category,
        ResourceName=name,
        ResourceType=type,
        ResourceGroup=resourceGroup,
        Location=location,
        SubscriptionId=subscriptionId,
        Recommendation,
        CostImpactCategory,
        EstimatedMonthlyCost,
        ImplementationImpact,
        ImplementationComplexity,
        ZoneConfigured,
        ResourceId=id
)
| union (
    // Cosmos DB - Complex cost calculation matching original workbook exactly
    resources
    | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) and location in~ ({ZonalRegions}) and type =~ 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts'
    | extend 
        multiRegionWrites = tobool(properties.enableMultipleWriteLocations),
        regionCount = array_length(properties.locations),
        capabilities = tostring(properties.capabilities),
        isServerless = tostring(properties.capabilities) contains "EnableServerless",
        hasAutoscale = tostring(properties.capabilities) contains "EnableAutoscale" or tostring(properties.capabilities) contains "autoscale"
    | mv-expand loc = properties.locations
    | extend z = tobool(loc.isZoneRedundant)
    | summarize ZoneConfigured = max(z) by id, type, name, resourceGroup, location, subscriptionId, multiRegionWrites, regionCount, capabilities, isServerless, hasAutoscale
    | where not(ZoneConfigured)
    | extend 
        accountType = case(
            multiRegionWrites and regionCount > 1, "Multi-region write",
            regionCount > 1, "Multi-region read",
            "Single-region"
        ),
        // Exact cost impact calculation from original workbook
        costImpactDescription = case(
            multiRegionWrites, "No additional cost - Multi-region write accounts have no billing impact",
            isServerless, "25% increase in request units (RU) consumption",
            hasAutoscale, "25% increase in provisioned RU/s - FREE for autoscale resources",
            "25% increase in provisioned RU/s (1.25x multiplier)"
        ),
        costCategory = case(
            multiRegionWrites or hasAutoscale, '🟢 Cost Est.',  // No cost impact or free
            '🟡 Cost Impact'  // 25% increase
        ),
        dollarCost = case(
            multiRegionWrites, "$0.00",  // No additional cost
            hasAutoscale, "$0.00",  // Free for autoscale
            "Variable: 25% increase in RU/s costs"
        )
    | extend 
        Recommendation = 'Enable Cosmos DB zone redundancy',
        CostImpactCategory = costCategory,
        EstimatedMonthlyCost = costImpactDescription,
        ImplementationImpact = case(
            multiRegionWrites or hasAutoscale, 'Low',  // No cost impact
            'Medium'  // 25% increase
        ),
        ImplementationComplexity = 'Low'  // Configuration change only
    | extend Category = 'Zone Adoption Checks'
    | project 
        Category,
        ResourceName=name,
        ResourceType=type,
        ResourceGroup=resourceGroup,
        Location=location,
        SubscriptionId=subscriptionId,
        Recommendation,
        CostImpactCategory,
        EstimatedMonthlyCost,
        ImplementationImpact,
        ImplementationComplexity,
        ZoneConfigured,
        ResourceId=id
)
| union (
    // AKS Special Case
    resources
    | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) and location in~ ({ZonalRegions}) and type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters'
    | mv-expand pool = properties.agentPoolProfiles
    | extend z = array_length(coalesce(pool.availabilityZones, dynamic([]))) > 1
    | summarize ZoneConfigured = max(z) by id, type, name, resourceGroup, location, subscriptionId
    | where not(ZoneConfigured)
    | extend 
        Recommendation = 'Configure node pools across multiple availability zones',
        CostImpactCategory = '� Cost Impact',
        EstimatedMonthlyCost = 'Minimal network cost increase - no compute cost change',
        ImplementationImpact = 'Low',
        ImplementationComplexity = 'Medium'
    | extend Category = 'Zone Adoption Checks'
    | project 
        Category,
        ResourceName=name,
        ResourceType=type,
        ResourceGroup=resourceGroup,
        Location=location,
        SubscriptionId=subscriptionId,
        Recommendation,
        CostImpactCategory,
        EstimatedMonthlyCost,
        ImplementationImpact,
        ImplementationComplexity,
        ZoneConfigured,
        ResourceId=id
)
| union (
    // Azure Backup Services - VM Backup Protection with Cost Calculation
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
        and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
    | project 
        VMName = name, 
        ResourceGroup = resourceGroup, 
        Location = location, 
        VMId = tolower(id), 
        subscriptionId
    // Join with managed disks to get disk size
    | join kind=leftouter (
        resources
        | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/disks'
        | project DiskId = id, VMId = tolower(managedBy), DiskSizeGB = tostring(properties.diskSizeGB)
    ) on $left.VMId == $right.VMId
    // Join with Recovery Services to check backup status
    | join kind=leftouter (
        recoveryservicesresources
        | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults/backupfabrics/protectioncontainers/protecteditems'
        | where properties.protectedItemType =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
        | extend sourceResourceId = tolower(tostring(properties.sourceResourceId))
        | where isnotempty(sourceResourceId)
        | distinct sourceResourceId
    ) on $left.VMId == $right.sourceResourceId
    | extend BackupStatus = iff(isempty(sourceResourceId), "Not Protected", "Protected")
    | where BackupStatus == "Not Protected"
    // Cost calculation
    | extend totalDiskGb       = todouble(DiskSizeGB),
             changeRateMonthly = todouble({changeRateDaily}) / 100.0,   // % of data change per day
             agentCost         = todouble({backupAgentCost})      // fixed backup agent cost
    | extend storageUsedGb     = totalDiskGb + totalDiskGb * (changeRateMonthly * 30)  // monthly churn
    | extend SnapshotStorageGb = (totalDiskGb * changeRateMonthly) * {snapshotRetention}
    | extend CostPerGB         = todouble({storagePricePerGbMonth})
    | extend SnapshotCostPerGB = todouble({snapshotPrice})
    // Cost components
    | extend CostperBackup     = storageUsedGb * CostPerGB
    | extend CostperSnapshot   = SnapshotStorageGb * SnapshotCostPerGB
    | extend EstimatedMonthlyBackupCost = CostperBackup + CostperSnapshot + agentCost
    // Final output
    | extend 
        Recommendation = "Enable VM Backup",
        ImplementationImpact = "High",
        ImplementationComplexity = "Low",
        CostImpactCategory = '🟢 Cost Est.',
        ZoneConfigured = false
    | extend Category = 'BCDR'
    | project 
        Category,
        ResourceName=VMName,
        ResourceType='microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/backup',
        ResourceGroup,
        Location,
        SubscriptionId=subscriptionId,
        Recommendation,
        CostImpactCategory,
        EstimatedMonthlyCost=strcat("$", tostring(round(EstimatedMonthlyBackupCost, 2))),
        ImplementationImpact,
        ImplementationComplexity,
        ZoneConfigured,
        ResourceId=VMId
)
| union (
    // Monitor - Azure Monitor Agent Check
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
        and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
    | project vmId = tolower(id), vmName = name, subscriptionId, resourceGroup, location, type
    | join kind=leftouter (
        resources
        | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/extensions'
        | where name =~ 'AzureMonitorWindowsAgent' or name =~ 'AzureMonitorLinuxAgent'
        | extend vmId = tolower(split(id, '/extensions/')[0])
        | project vmId, hasAMA = true
    ) on vmId
    | extend hasAMA = iff(isnull(hasAMA), false, true)
    | where hasAMA == false
    | extend 
        Recommendation = "Install Azure Monitor Agent",
        CostImpactCategory = '🟢 No additional cost',
        EstimatedMonthlyCost = "$0.00",
        ImplementationImpact = "High",
        ImplementationComplexity = "Low",
        ZoneConfigured = false
    | extend Category = 'Monitor'
    | project 
        Category,
        ResourceName=vmName,
        ResourceType=type,
        ResourceGroup=resourceGroup,
        Location=location,
        SubscriptionId=subscriptionId,
        Recommendation,
        CostImpactCategory,
        EstimatedMonthlyCost,
        ImplementationImpact,
        ImplementationComplexity,
        ZoneConfigured,
        ResourceId=vmId
)
| extend NumericCost = case(
    // Extract numeric values from cost strings that start with $
    EstimatedMonthlyCost startswith "$" and not(EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "increase" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "N/A" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "Complex" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "Variable" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "Minimal"),
        todouble(replace(@"\$", "", EstimatedMonthlyCost)),
    // For non-numeric costs, set to 0 for aggregation purposes
    0.0
)
| summarize 
    ImpactedResourceCount = count(),
    TotalEstimatedMonthlyCost = sum(NumericCost),
    CostType = case(
        sum(NumericCost) > 0, "Calculable",
        any(EstimatedMonthlyCost) contains "increase", "Percentage Impact",
        any(EstimatedMonthlyCost) contains "Complex", "Complex Pricing",
        any(EstimatedMonthlyCost) contains "Variable", "Variable Pricing",
        any(EstimatedMonthlyCost) contains "N/A", "Not Applicable",
        "Mixed"
    ),
    SampleCostDescription = any(EstimatedMonthlyCost),
    ImplementationImpact = any(ImplementationImpact),
    ImplementationComplexity = any(ImplementationComplexity),
    CostImpactCategory = any(CostImpactCategory)
by Recommendation, Category
| extend FormattedTotalCost = case(
    TotalEstimatedMonthlyCost > 0, strcat("$", tostring(round(TotalEstimatedMonthlyCost, 2))),
    CostType == "Percentage Impact", SampleCostDescription,
    CostType == "Complex Pricing", "See Azure Calculator",
    CostType == "Variable Pricing", "Variable - depends on configuration",
    CostType == "Not Applicable", "N/A",
    // For services showing "$0.00" cost, show that instead of "Can't be estimated"
    SampleCostDescription == "$0.00", "$0.00",
    "Can't be estimated"
)
| project 
    Category,
    Recommendation,
    ImpactedResourceCount,
    EstimatedCost=FormattedTotalCost,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity
| order by Category asc, Recommendation asc, ImpactedResourceCount desc, EstimatedCost asc, ImplementationImpact asc, ImplementationComplexity asc","size":0,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"ImplementationComplexity","formatter":5}],"rowLimit":10000,"filter":true,"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"Category","sortOrder":1}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"Category","sortOrder":1}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"AlwaysHidden","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"True"},"name":"querySummaryOfRecs"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// Cost Summary by Category
// This query summarizes the estimated monthly cost by main category (Zone Adoption, BCDR, Security, Monitor)

(
    // Zone Adoption Checks
    resources
    | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) and location in~ ({ZonalRegions}) and type in~ (
        'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines',
        'Microsoft.Compute/disks',
        'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls',
        'microsoft.network/applicationGateways',
        'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses',
        'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways',
        'microsoft.network/bastionhosts',
        'microsoft.network/loadbalancers',
        'microsoft.sql/servers/databases',
        'microsoft.cache/redis',
        'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers',
        'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers',
        'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts',
        'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes',
        'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets',
        'microsoft.apimanagement/service',
        'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces',
        'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces',
        'microsoft.web/serverfarms',
        'microsoft.containerregistry/registries',
        'microsoft.app/managedenvironments',
        'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults'
    )
    | extend ZoneConfigured = case(
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', not(isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) == 0),
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', tostring(sku.name) in ('Premium_ZRS', 'StandardSSD_ZRS'),
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', tostring(properties.sku.tier) contains 'AZ',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', tolower(tostring(sku.name)) != 'basic' and array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'microsoft.sql/servers/databases', name != 'master' and tobool(properties.zoneRedundant),
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', not(properties.zonalAllocationPolicy != 'Automatic' and (array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) <= 1 or isnull(zones))),
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode) == 'ZoneRedundant',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode) == 'ZoneRedundant',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', tostring(sku.name) endswith_cs 'ZRS',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 1,
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', not(tags has "aks-managed-orchestrator" or name startswith "aks-") and not(isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) <= 1),
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', not(isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) <= 1),
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', not(iff(tobool(properties.zoneRedundant) == true, true, false) == false),
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', not(tostring(properties.zoneRedundant) == "false"),
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', tostring(sku.name) != "Y1" and (tobool(properties.zoneRedundant) == false or (tostring(sku.tier) in~ ('PremiumV2', 'PremiumV3', 'PremiumV4', 'Isolated', 'IsolatedV2') and (isnull(properties.supportsZoneRedundancy) or not(tobool(properties.supportsZoneRedundancy))))),
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', not(location in~ ({ZonalRegions})),
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', not(tobool(properties.zoneRedundant)),
        type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', not(tostring(properties.storageModelType) == "ZoneRedundant" or tostring(properties.storageType) == "ZoneRedundant"),
        false
    )
    | where not(ZoneConfigured)
    | extend Category = 'Zone Adoption Checks'
    | extend CostImpactCategory = case(
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', '🟡 Cost Impact',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', '🟢 Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', '🟢 Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', '🟢 Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', '🟡 Cost Impact',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', '🔴 No Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', '🟡 Cost Impact',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', '🔴 No Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', '🟢 Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', '🟢 Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/publicipaddresses', '🟢 Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', '🔴 No Cost Est.',
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', '🟢 No additional cost',
        type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', '🟡 Cost Impact',
        '🔍 Review Required'
    )
    | extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = case(
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', 
            strcat("$", tostring(round(
                (todouble({AppGWperhour}) * 730) + 
                (todouble({CapacityUnitperhour}) * 730) + 
                case(
                    todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) <= 100, 0.0,
                    todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) <= 10340, (todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) - 100) * todouble({dataTransferTier1Price}),
                    todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) <= 51440, ((10340 - 100) * todouble({dataTransferTier1Price})) + ((todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) - 10340) * todouble({dataTransferTier2Price})),
                    todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) <= 153840, ((10340 - 100) * todouble({dataTransferTier1Price})) + ((51440 - 10340) * todouble({dataTransferTier2Price})) + ((todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) - 51440) * todouble({dataTransferTier3Price})),
                    ((10340 - 100) * todouble({dataTransferTier1Price})) + ((51440 - 10340) * todouble({dataTransferTier2Price})) + ((153840 - 51440) * todouble({dataTransferTier3Price})) + ((todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) - 153840) * todouble({dataTransferTier4Price}))
                ), 2))),
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', strcat("$", tostring(round(todouble({PIPPerHour}) * 730, 2))),
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways',
            case(
                tostring(properties.sku.name) contains 'AZ', "$0.00",
                strcat("$", tostring(round(
                    case(
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) in~ ('Basic', 'Standard', 'HighPerformance', 'VpnGw1'), 153.30,
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) =~ 'VpnGw2', 394.20,
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) =~ 'VpnGw3', 1007.40,
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) =~ 'VpnGw4', 1686.30,
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) =~ 'VpnGw5', 2934.60,
                        153.30
                    ) +
                    case(
                        todouble({s2stunnels}) <= 10, 0.0,
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) in~ ('Basic', 'Standard', 'HighPerformance', 'VpnGw1', 'VpnGw2', 'VpnGw3') and todouble({s2stunnels}) <= 30, 
                            (todouble({s2stunnels}) - 10) * 0.015 * 730,
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) in~ ('VpnGw4', 'VpnGw5') and todouble({s2stunnels}) <= 100, 
                            (todouble({s2stunnels}) - 10) * 0.015 * 730,
                        0.0
                    ) +
                    case(
                        todouble({P2SConnections}) <= 128, 0.0,
                        (todouble({P2SConnections}) - 128) * 0.01 * 730
                    ), 2)))
            ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', 
            strcat("$", tostring(round(
                case(
                    todouble({NetworkRules}) <= 5, todouble({NetworkRules}) * 0.025 * 730,
                    (5 * 0.025 * 730) + ((todouble({NetworkRules}) - 5) * 0.01 * 730)
                ) + 
                (todouble({DataProcessedGb}) * 0.005), 2))),
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', 
            case(
                tostring(sku.name) == "Premium_LRS", strcat("$", tostring(round((todouble({premiumZrsPricePerGB}) - todouble({premiumSsdPricePerGB})) * toint(properties.diskSizeGB), 2))),
                tostring(sku.name) == "StandardSSD_LRS", strcat("$", tostring(round((todouble({standardSsdZrsPricePerGB}) - todouble({standardSsdPricePerGB})) * toint(properties.diskSizeGB), 2))),
                tostring(sku.name) == "Standard_LRS", strcat("$", tostring(round((todouble({standardSsdZrsPricePerGB}) - todouble({standardHddPricePerGB})) * toint(properties.diskSizeGB), 2))),
                "$0.00"
            ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', "100-200% increase",
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', "Minimal network cost increase",
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', "100% increase",
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', "Complex pricing",
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', "Variable",
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', "Complex pricing",
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', "NA",
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', "Minimal increase",
        "NA"
    )
    | project Category, EstimatedMonthlyCost, type
)
| union (
    // BCDR - VM Backup Protection
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
        and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
    | project 
        VMId = tolower(id), 
        type
    | join kind=leftouter (
        resources
        | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/disks'
        | project DiskId = id, VMId = tolower(managedBy), DiskSizeGB = tostring(properties.diskSizeGB)
    ) on $left.VMId == $right.VMId
    | join kind=leftouter (
        recoveryservicesresources
        | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults/backupfabrics/protectioncontainers/protecteditems'
        | where properties.protectedItemType =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
        | extend sourceResourceId = tolower(tostring(properties.sourceResourceId))
        | where isnotempty(sourceResourceId)
        | distinct sourceResourceId
    ) on $left.VMId == $right.sourceResourceId
    | extend BackupStatus = iff(isempty(sourceResourceId), "Not Protected", "Protected")
    | where BackupStatus == "Not Protected"
    | extend totalDiskGb       = todouble(DiskSizeGB),
             changeRateMonthly = todouble({changeRateDaily}) / 100.0,
             agentCost         = todouble({backupAgentCost})
    | extend storageUsedGb     = totalDiskGb + totalDiskGb * (changeRateMonthly * 30)
    | extend SnapshotStorageGb = (totalDiskGb * changeRateMonthly) * {snapshotRetention}
    | extend CostPerGB         = todouble({storagePricePerGbMonth})
    | extend SnapshotCostPerGB = todouble({snapshotPrice})
    | extend CostperBackup     = storageUsedGb * CostPerGB
    | extend CostperSnapshot   = SnapshotStorageGb * SnapshotCostPerGB
    | extend EstimatedMonthlyBackupCost = CostperBackup + CostperSnapshot + agentCost
    | extend Category = 'BCDR'
    | extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = strcat("$", tostring(round(EstimatedMonthlyBackupCost, 2)))
    | project Category, EstimatedMonthlyCost, type
)
| union (
    // Security - Defender for Cloud
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
        and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
    | extend vmIdLower = tolower(id)
    | project vmIdLower, type
    | join kind=leftouter (
        resources
        | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/extensions'
        | where tolower(name) has "mde.windows"
            or tolower(tostring(properties.type)) == "mde.windows"
            or tolower(tostring(properties.publisher)) == "microsoft.azure.azuredefenderforservers"
        | where tolower(tostring(properties.provisioningState)) == "succeeded"
        | extend vmIdLower = tolower(tostring(split(id, "/extensions/")[0]))
        | project vmIdLower
        | distinct vmIdLower
    ) on vmIdLower
    | where isempty(vmIdLower1)
    | extend AgentCost = todouble({defenderforServeragent})
    | extend Category = 'Security'
    | extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = strcat("$", tostring(round(AgentCost, 2)))
    | project Category, EstimatedMonthlyCost, type
)
| extend NumericCost = case(
    EstimatedMonthlyCost startswith "$" and not(EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "increase" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "N/A" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "Complex" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "Variable" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "Minimal"),
        todouble(replace(@"\$", "", EstimatedMonthlyCost)),
    0.0
)
| summarize 
    ResourceCount = count(),
    TotalEstimatedCost = sum(NumericCost),
    EstimableResources = countif(NumericCost > 0),
    NonEstimableResources = countif(NumericCost == 0)
by Category
| extend FormattedCost = case(
    TotalEstimatedCost > 0, strcat("$", tostring(round(TotalEstimatedCost, 2))),
    "Not calculable"
)
| project 
    Category,
    ResourceCount,
    EstimableResources,
    NonEstimableResources,
    TotalEstimatedMonthlyCost = FormattedCost
| order by Category asc
","size":0,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"ImplementationComplexity","formatter":5}],"filter":true},"sortBy":[]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"AlwaysHidden","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"true"},"name":"queryZoneAdoptionExport - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
    and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| extend vmId = tolower(id)
| join kind=leftouter (
    securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
    | where properties.resourceDetails.ResourceType =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
    | extend vmId = tolower(tostring(properties.resourceDetails.Id))
    | summarize hasAssessments = count() by vmId
) on vmId
| where isempty(hasAssessments)
// Cost calculation
| extend AgentCost = todouble({defenderforServeragent})
| extend 
    Recommendation = "Enable Defender for Cloud on VM",
    ImplementationImpact = "High",
    ImplementationComplexity = "Low",
    CostImpactCategory = '🟢 Cost Est.',
    ZoneConfigured = false
| extend Category = 'Security'
| project 
    Category,
    ResourceName=name,
    ResourceType='microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/defender',
    ResourceGroup=resourceGroup,
    Location=location,
    SubscriptionId=subscriptionId,
    Recommendation,
    CostImpactCategory,
    EstimatedMonthlyCost=strcat("$", tostring(round(AgentCost, 2))),
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    ZoneConfigured,
    ResourceId=vmId
// Aggregate results by recommendation
| extend NumericCost = case(
    EstimatedMonthlyCost startswith "$" and not(EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "increase" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "N/A" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "Complex" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "Variable" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "Minimal"),
        todouble(replace(@"\$", "", EstimatedMonthlyCost)),
    0.0
)
| summarize 
    ImpactedResourceCount = count(),
    TotalEstimatedMonthlyCost = sum(NumericCost),
    CostType = case(
        sum(NumericCost) > 0, "Calculable",
        any(EstimatedMonthlyCost) contains "increase", "Percentage Impact",
        any(EstimatedMonthlyCost) contains "Complex", "Complex Pricing",
        any(EstimatedMonthlyCost) contains "Variable", "Variable Pricing",
        any(EstimatedMonthlyCost) contains "N/A", "Not Applicable",
        "Mixed"
    ),
    SampleCostDescription = any(EstimatedMonthlyCost),
    ImplementationImpact = any(ImplementationImpact),
    ImplementationComplexity = any(ImplementationComplexity),
    CostImpactCategory = any(CostImpactCategory)
by Recommendation, Category
| extend FormattedTotalCost = case(
    TotalEstimatedMonthlyCost > 0, strcat("$", tostring(round(TotalEstimatedMonthlyCost, 2))),
    CostType == "Percentage Impact", SampleCostDescription,
    CostType == "Complex Pricing", "See Azure Calculator",
    CostType == "Variable Pricing", "Variable - depends on configuration",
    CostType == "Not Applicable", "N/A",
    SampleCostDescription == "$0.00", "$0.00",
    "Can't be estimated"
)
| project 
    Category,
    Recommendation,
    ImpactedResourceCount,
    EstimatedCost=FormattedTotalCost,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity
| order by Category asc, Recommendation asc, ImpactedResourceCount desc, EstimatedCost asc, ImplementationImpact asc, ImplementationComplexity asc
","size":0,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"AlwaysHidden","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"true"},"name":"SecurityQuery"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"{"version":"Merge/1.0","merges":[{"id":"6e647884-5cd3-4e21-86bb-544231f740db","mergeType":"union","leftTable":"querySummaryOfRecs","rightTable":"SecurityQuery"}],"projectRename":[{"originalName":"[querySummaryOfRecs].Category","mergedName":"Category","fromId":"6e647884-5cd3-4e21-86bb-544231f740db"},{"originalName":"[querySummaryOfRecs].Recommendation","mergedName":"Recommendation","fromId":"6e647884-5cd3-4e21-86bb-544231f740db"},{"originalName":"[querySummaryOfRecs].ImpactedResourceCount","mergedName":"ImpactedResourceCount","fromId":"6e647884-5cd3-4e21-86bb-544231f740db"},{"originalName":"[querySummaryOfRecs].EstimatedCost","mergedName":"EstimatedCost","fromId":"6e647884-5cd3-4e21-86bb-544231f740db"},{"originalName":"[querySummaryOfRecs].ImplementationImpact","mergedName":"ImplementationImpact","fromId":"6e647884-5cd3-4e21-86bb-544231f740db"},{"originalName":"[querySummaryOfRecs].ImplementationComplexity","mergedName":"ImplementationComplexity","fromId":"6e647884-5cd3-4e21-86bb-544231f740db"},{"originalName":"Category","mergedName":"Category","fromId":"unknown"},{"originalName":"Recommendation","mergedName":"Recommendation","fromId":"unknown"},{"originalName":"ImpactedResourceCount","mergedName":"ImpactedResourceCount","fromId":"unknown"},{"originalName":"EstimatedCost","mergedName":"EstimatedCost","fromId":"unknown"},{"originalName":"ImplementationImpact","mergedName":"ImplementationImpact","fromId":"unknown"},{"originalName":"ImplementationComplexity","mergedName":"ImplementationComplexity","fromId":"unknown"}]}","size":0,"queryType":7,"gridSettings":{"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"Category","sortOrder":1}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"Category","sortOrder":1}]},"showPin":false,"name":"SummaryofCosts"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// Grand Total Cost Summary
// This query calculates the total estimated monthly cost across all categories (Zone Adoption, BCDR, Security)

(
    // Zone Adoption Checks
    resources
    | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) and location in~ ({ZonalRegions}) and type in~ (
        'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines',
        'Microsoft.Compute/disks',
        'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls',
        'microsoft.network/applicationGateways',
        'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses',
        'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways',
        'microsoft.network/bastionhosts',
        'microsoft.network/loadbalancers',
        'microsoft.sql/servers/databases',
        'microsoft.cache/redis',
        'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers',
        'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers',
        'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts',
        'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes',
        'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets',
        'microsoft.apimanagement/service',
        'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces',
        'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces',
        'microsoft.web/serverfarms',
        'microsoft.containerregistry/registries',
        'microsoft.app/managedenvironments',
        'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults'
    )
    | extend ZoneConfigured = case(
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', not(isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) == 0),
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', tostring(sku.name) in ('Premium_ZRS', 'StandardSSD_ZRS'),
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', tostring(properties.sku.tier) contains 'AZ',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', tolower(tostring(sku.name)) != 'basic' and array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
        type =~ 'microsoft.sql/servers/databases', name != 'master' and tobool(properties.zoneRedundant),
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', not(properties.zonalAllocationPolicy != 'Automatic' and (array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) <= 1 or isnull(zones))),
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode) == 'ZoneRedundant',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode) == 'ZoneRedundant',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', tostring(sku.name) endswith_cs 'ZRS',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 1,
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', not(tags has "aks-managed-orchestrator" or name startswith "aks-") and not(isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) <= 1),
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', not(isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) <= 1),
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', not(iff(tobool(properties.zoneRedundant) == true, true, false) == false),
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', not(tostring(properties.zoneRedundant) == "false"),
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', tostring(sku.name) != "Y1" and (tobool(properties.zoneRedundant) == false or (tostring(sku.tier) in~ ('PremiumV2', 'PremiumV3', 'PremiumV4', 'Isolated', 'IsolatedV2') and (isnull(properties.supportsZoneRedundancy) or not(tobool(properties.supportsZoneRedundancy))))),
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', not(location in~ ({ZonalRegions})),
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', not(tobool(properties.zoneRedundant)),
        type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', not(tostring(properties.storageModelType) == "ZoneRedundant" or tostring(properties.storageType) == "ZoneRedundant"),
        false
    )
    | where not(ZoneConfigured)
    | extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = case(
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', 
            strcat("$", tostring(round(
                (todouble({AppGWperhour}) * 730) + 
                (todouble({CapacityUnitperhour}) * 730) + 
                case(
                    todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) <= 100, 0.0,
                    todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) <= 10340, (todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) - 100) * todouble({dataTransferTier1Price}),
                    todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) <= 51440, ((10340 - 100) * todouble({dataTransferTier1Price})) + ((todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) - 10340) * todouble({dataTransferTier2Price})),
                    todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) <= 153840, ((10340 - 100) * todouble({dataTransferTier1Price})) + ((51440 - 10340) * todouble({dataTransferTier2Price})) + ((todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) - 51440) * todouble({dataTransferTier3Price})),
                    ((10340 - 100) * todouble({dataTransferTier1Price})) + ((51440 - 10340) * todouble({dataTransferTier2Price})) + ((153840 - 51440) * todouble({dataTransferTier3Price})) + ((todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb}) - 153840) * todouble({dataTransferTier4Price}))
                ), 2))),
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', strcat("$", tostring(round(todouble({PIPPerHour}) * 730, 2))),
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways',
            case(
                tostring(properties.sku.name) contains 'AZ', "$0.00",
                strcat("$", tostring(round(
                    case(
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) in~ ('Basic', 'Standard', 'HighPerformance', 'VpnGw1'), 153.30,
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) =~ 'VpnGw2', 394.20,
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) =~ 'VpnGw3', 1007.40,
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) =~ 'VpnGw4', 1686.30,
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) =~ 'VpnGw5', 2934.60,
                        153.30
                    ) +
                    case(
                        todouble({s2stunnels}) <= 10, 0.0,
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) in~ ('Basic', 'Standard', 'HighPerformance', 'VpnGw1', 'VpnGw2', 'VpnGw3') and todouble({s2stunnels}) <= 30, 
                            (todouble({s2stunnels}) - 10) * 0.015 * 730,
                        tostring(properties.sku.name) in~ ('VpnGw4', 'VpnGw5') and todouble({s2stunnels}) <= 100, 
                            (todouble({s2stunnels}) - 10) * 0.015 * 730,
                        0.0
                    ) +
                    case(
                        todouble({P2SConnections}) <= 128, 0.0,
                        (todouble({P2SConnections}) - 128) * 0.01 * 730
                    ), 2)))
            ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', 
            strcat("$", tostring(round(
                case(
                    todouble({NetworkRules}) <= 5, todouble({NetworkRules}) * 0.025 * 730,
                    (5 * 0.025 * 730) + ((todouble({NetworkRules}) - 5) * 0.01 * 730)
                ) + 
                (todouble({DataProcessedGb}) * 0.005), 2))),
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', 
            case(
                tostring(sku.name) == "Premium_LRS", strcat("$", tostring(round((todouble({premiumZrsPricePerGB}) - todouble({premiumSsdPricePerGB})) * toint(properties.diskSizeGB), 2))),
                tostring(sku.name) == "StandardSSD_LRS", strcat("$", tostring(round((todouble({standardSsdZrsPricePerGB}) - todouble({standardSsdPricePerGB})) * toint(properties.diskSizeGB), 2))),
                tostring(sku.name) == "Standard_LRS", strcat("$", tostring(round((todouble({standardSsdZrsPricePerGB}) - todouble({standardHddPricePerGB})) * toint(properties.diskSizeGB), 2))),
                "$0.00"
            ),
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', "100-200% increase",
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', "Minimal network cost increase",
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', "100% increase",
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', "Complex pricing",
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', "Variable",
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', "Complex pricing",
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', "NA",
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', "$0.00",
        type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', "Minimal increase",
        "NA"
    )
    | project EstimatedMonthlyCost, type
)
| union (
    // BCDR - VM Backup Protection
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
        and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
    | project 
        VMId = tolower(id), 
        type
    | join kind=leftouter (
        resources
        | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/disks'
        | project DiskId = id, VMId = tolower(managedBy), DiskSizeGB = tostring(properties.diskSizeGB)
    ) on $left.VMId == $right.VMId
    | join kind=leftouter (
        recoveryservicesresources
        | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults/backupfabrics/protectioncontainers/protecteditems'
        | where properties.protectedItemType =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
        | extend sourceResourceId = tolower(tostring(properties.sourceResourceId))
        | where isnotempty(sourceResourceId)
        | distinct sourceResourceId
    ) on $left.VMId == $right.sourceResourceId
    | extend BackupStatus = iff(isempty(sourceResourceId), "Not Protected", "Protected")
    | where BackupStatus == "Not Protected"
    | extend totalDiskGb       = todouble(DiskSizeGB),
             changeRateMonthly = todouble({changeRateDaily}) / 100.0,
             agentCost         = todouble({backupAgentCost})
    | extend storageUsedGb     = totalDiskGb + totalDiskGb * (changeRateMonthly * 30)
    | extend SnapshotStorageGb = (totalDiskGb * changeRateMonthly) * {snapshotRetention}
    | extend CostPerGB         = todouble({storagePricePerGbMonth})
    | extend SnapshotCostPerGB = todouble({snapshotPrice})
    | extend CostperBackup     = storageUsedGb * CostPerGB
    | extend CostperSnapshot   = SnapshotStorageGb * SnapshotCostPerGB
    | extend EstimatedMonthlyBackupCost = CostperBackup + CostperSnapshot + agentCost
    | extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = strcat("$", tostring(round(EstimatedMonthlyBackupCost, 2)))
    | project EstimatedMonthlyCost, type
)
| union (
    // Security - Defender for Cloud
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
        and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
    | extend vmIdLower = tolower(id)
    | project vmIdLower, type
    | join kind=leftouter (
        resources
        | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/extensions'
        | where tolower(name) has "mde.windows"
            or tolower(tostring(properties.type)) == "mde.windows"
            or tolower(tostring(properties.publisher)) == "microsoft.azure.azuredefenderforservers"
        | where tolower(tostring(properties.provisioningState)) == "succeeded"
        | extend vmIdLower = tolower(tostring(split(id, "/extensions/")[0]))
        | project vmIdLower
        | distinct vmIdLower
    ) on vmIdLower
    | where isempty(vmIdLower1)
    | extend AgentCost = todouble({defenderforServeragent})
    | extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = strcat("$", tostring(round(AgentCost, 2)))
    | project EstimatedMonthlyCost, type
)
| extend NumericCost = case(
    EstimatedMonthlyCost startswith "$" and not(EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "increase" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "N/A" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "Complex" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "Variable" or EstimatedMonthlyCost contains "Minimal"),
        todouble(replace(@"\$", "", EstimatedMonthlyCost)),
    0.0
)
| summarize 
TotalResources = strcat(count(), " impacted resources"),
    ResourcesWithCalculableCost = countif(NumericCost > 0),
    ResourcesWithNonCalculableCost = countif(NumericCost == 0),
    GrandTotalMonthlyCost = sum(NumericCost)
| extend
TotalImpactedResources= "Grand total",
ImpactedResources = "Impacted resources"
| project 
    TotalResources,
    TotalImpactedResources,
    ImpactedResources,
    ResourcesWithCalculableCost,
    ResourcesWithNonCalculableCost,
    GrandTotalMonthlyCost = strcat("$", tostring(round(GrandTotalMonthlyCost, 2)))
","size":0,"title":"Grand total","showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"ImplementationComplexity","formatter":5}],"filter":true},"sortBy":[],"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"TotalImpactedResources","formatter":1},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"GrandTotalMonthlyCost","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"auto"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"decimal","maximumFractionDigits":2,"maximumSignificantDigits":3}}},"secondaryContent":{"columnMatch":"TotalResources"},"showBorder":false,"size":"full"}},"name":"queryZoneAdoptionExport -GrandTotal"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"enableSummaryOfRecommendations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"summaryofRecommendations"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"SelectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Overview"},"name":"Welcome"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Zone Adoption","items":[{"type":11,"content":{"version":"LinkItem/1.0","style":"tabs","links":[{"id":"ca40468d-4518-43bf-ac6e-0a11d7331e12","cellValue":"SelectedSubTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Overview","subTarget":"Overview","style":"link"},{"id":"f280fc2a-f42a-42a4-ad4b-be37ab3e8b48","cellValue":"SelectedSubTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Details","subTarget":"Details","style":"link"}]},"name":"links - zoneSubTab"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Zone Overview","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"# Availability Zones
## Availability Zone Best Practice Checks
This section reviews your Azure resources for alignment with Availability Zone best practices. Recommendations focus on deploying resources across multiple zones to enhance resiliency and minimize the impact of zone-level failures. Implementing these recommendations helps ensure high availability and business continuity for your critical workloads.","style":"upsell"},"name":"text - AvailabilityZone"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"(
    // Subquery to find all non-compliant resources and their details
    (
        // Sub-subquery to analyze all resources and determine their zone status
        resources
        | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) and location in~ ({ZonalRegions}) and type in~ ('Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines','Microsoft.Compute/disks','microsoft.network/azurefirewalls','microsoft.network/applicationGateways','Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses','microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways','microsoft.network/bastionhosts','microsoft.network/loadbalancers','microsoft.sql/servers/databases','microsoft.cache/redis','microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers','microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers','Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts','Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes','microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets','microsoft.apimanagement/service','microsoft.servicebus/namespaces','microsoft.eventhub/namespaces','microsoft.web/serverfarms','microsoft.containerregistry/registries','microsoft.app/managedenvironments')
        | extend ZoneConfigured = case(
            type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 0,
            type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', (tostring(sku.name) has_cs 'ZRS') or array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 0,
            type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
            type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
            type =~ 'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
            type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', tostring(properties.sku.tier) contains 'AZ',
            type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
            type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', tolower(tostring(sku.name)) != 'basic' and array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
            type =~ 'microsoft.sql/servers/databases', tobool(properties.zoneRedundant),
            type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', not(properties.zonalAllocationPolicy != 'Automatic' and (isnull(zones) or array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) <= 1)),
            type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode) == 'ZoneRedundant',
            type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode) == 'ZoneRedundant',
            type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', tostring(sku.name) endswith_cs 'ZRS',
            type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 1,
            type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 1,
            type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 1,
            type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', tobool(properties.zoneRedundant),
            type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', tobool(properties.zoneRedundant),
            type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', tobool(properties.zoneRedundant),
            type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', tostring(properties.zoneRedundancy) =~ 'Enabled',
            type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', tostring(properties.zoneRedundant) !~ 'false',
            false)
        | project id, type, ZoneConfigured
    )
    | union (
        resources
        | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) and location in~ ({ZonalRegions}) and type =~ 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts'
        | mv-expand loc = properties.locations | extend z = tobool(loc.isZoneRedundant) | summarize ZoneConfigured = max(z) by id, type
    )
    | union (
        resources
        | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) and location in~ ({ZonalRegions}) and type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters'
        | mv-expand pool = properties.agentPoolProfiles | extend z = array_length(coalesce(pool.availabilityZones, dynamic([]))) > 1 | summarize ZoneConfigured = max(z) by id, type
    )
    | where not(ZoneConfigured)
    | extend Recommendation = case(
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', 'Deploy VMs across Availability Zones',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', 'Use Azure Disks with Zone Redundant Storage',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', 'Enable multi-zone Application Gateway',
