        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', 'Deploy Azure Firewall across multiple availability zones',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', 'Move to ZRS/GZRS storage',
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', 'Enable zone redundancy on App Service Plan',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', 'Use multi-zone AKS node pools',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', 'Enable ACR zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', 'Enable multi-zone API Management',
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', 'Enable Service Bus zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', 'Enable Event Hub zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', 'Enable Redis zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', 'Enable MySQL zone-redundant HA',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', 'Enable PostgreSQL zone-redundant HA',
        type =~ 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts', 'Enable Cosmos DB zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', 'Use zone-redundant Standard Load Balancer',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', 'Use AZ SKU Virtual Network Gateway',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/publicipaddresses', 'Create / convert to zone-redundant Public IP',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', 'Deploy Bastion host across zones',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', 'Review ANF multi-zone deployment',
        type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', 'Enable Container Apps env zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', 'Distribute VM Scale Set across zones',
        '')
    | extend
        ImplementationImpact = case(Recommendation == 'Deploy VMs across Availability Zones', 'High', Recommendation == 'Use Azure Disks with Zone Redundant Storage', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable multi-zone Application Gateway', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Deploy Azure Firewall across multiple availability zones', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Move to ZRS/GZRS storage', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Enable zone redundancy on App Service Plan', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Use multi-zone AKS node pools', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable ACR zone redundancy', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Enable Service Bus zone redundancy', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable Event Hub zone redundancy', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable Redis zone redundancy', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable MySQL zone-redundant HA', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable PostgreSQL zone-redundant HA', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable Cosmos DB zone redundancy', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Use zone-redundant Standard Load Balancer', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Use AZ SKU Virtual Network Gateway', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Create / convert to zone-redundant Public IP', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Deploy Bastion host across zones', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Review ANF multi-zone deployment', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable Container Apps env zone redundancy', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Distribute VM Scale Set across zones', 'Medium', ''),
        ImplementationComplexity = case(Recommendation == 'Deploy VMs across Availability Zones', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Use Azure Disks with Zone Redundant Storage', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable multi-zone Application Gateway', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Deploy Azure Firewall across multiple availability zones', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Move to ZRS/GZRS storage', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Enable zone redundancy on App Service Plan', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Use multi-zone AKS node pools', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable ACR zone redundancy', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Enable Service Bus zone redundancy', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable Event Hub zone redundancy', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable Redis zone redundancy', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable MySQL zone-redundant HA', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable PostgreSQL zone-redundant HA', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable Cosmos DB zone redundancy', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Use zone-redundant Standard Load Balancer', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Use AZ SKU Virtual Network Gateway', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Create / convert to zone-redundant Public IP', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Deploy Bastion host across zones', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Review ANF multi-zone deployment', 'Medium', Recommendation == 'Enable Container Apps env zone redundancy', 'Low', Recommendation == 'Distribute VM Scale Set across zones', 'Medium', ''),
        RecommendationId = case(Recommendation == 'Deploy VMs across Availability Zones', '2bd0be95-a825-6f47-a8c6-3db1fb5eb387', Recommendation == 'Use Azure Disks with Zone Redundant Storage', 'fa0cf4f5-0b21-47b7-89a9-ee936f193ce1', Recommendation == 'Enable multi-zone Application Gateway', '5c488377-be3e-4365-92e8-09d1e8d9038c', Recommendation == 'Deploy Azure Firewall across multiple availability zones', 'e82f5b61-b0f8-48e7-8e18-5aa1f57bff81', Recommendation == 'Move to ZRS/GZRS storage', 'e6c7e1cc-2f47-264d-aa50-1da421314472', Recommendation == 'Enable zone redundancy on App Service Plan', '88cb90c2-3b99-814b-9820-821a63f600dd', Recommendation == 'Use multi-zone AKS node pools', '9f3263db-b9c0-43bb-8523-6800f9f50793', Recommendation == 'Enable ACR zone redundancy', '63491f70-22e4-3b4a-8b0c-845450e46fac', Recommendation == 'Enable Service Bus zone redundancy', '9dff9f9b-1e61-4fbf-9168-c0432240c53b', Recommendation == 'Enable Event Hub zone redundancy', '0f1bfad1-1f47-44dd-a858-71cc2610b9d4', Recommendation == 'Enable Redis zone redundancy', '5a44bd30-ae6a-4b81-9b68-dc3a8ffca4d8', Recommendation == 'Enable MySQL zone-redundant HA', '88856605-53d8-4bbd-a75b-4a7b14939d32', Recommendation == 'Enable PostgreSQL zone-redundant HA', '80b4e93c-4500-4fbd-bd6f-3ec245f72be9', Recommendation == 'Enable Cosmos DB zone redundancy', '921631f6-ed59-49a5-94c1-f0f3ececa580', Recommendation == 'Use zone-redundant Standard Load Balancer', '332e07de-da0d-4ee7-b1c4-ca9016005e1d', Recommendation == 'Use AZ SKU Virtual Network Gateway', '1afa00b3-bb4c-496d-99e5-b7bda59a057c', Recommendation == 'Create / convert to zone-redundant Public IP', 'c63b81fb-7afc-894c-a840-91bb8a8dcfaf', Recommendation == 'Deploy Bastion host across zones', 'c9b0c6f6-1f64-4b4b-8165-00770b295dd7', Recommendation == 'Review ANF multi-zone deployment', '47d100a5-7f85-5742-967a-67eb5081240a', Recommendation == 'Enable Container Apps env zone redundancy', '8dbcd94b-0948-4df3-b608-1946726c3abf', Recommendation == 'Distribute VM Scale Set across zones', '1422c567-782c-7148-ac7c-5fc14cf45adc', '')
    | where isnotempty(Recommendation)
    | project id, type, Recommendation, RecommendationId, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity
)
| join kind=leftouter (
    // Subquery to get the total count of all relevant resources by type
    resources
    | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) and location in~ ({ZonalRegions}) and type in~ ('Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines','Microsoft.Compute/disks','microsoft.network/azurefirewalls','microsoft.network/applicationGateways','Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses','microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways','microsoft.network/bastionhosts','microsoft.network/loadbalancers','microsoft.sql/servers/databases','microsoft.cache/redis','microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers','microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers','Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts','Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes','microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets','microsoft.apimanagement/service','microsoft.servicebus/namespaces','microsoft.eventhub/namespaces','microsoft.web/serverfarms','microsoft.containerregistry/registries','microsoft.app/managedenvironments','microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts','microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters')
    | summarize Total = count() by type
) on type
| summarize ImpactedCount = count() by RecommendationId, type, Recommendation, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity, Total
| extend ImpactedResources = strcat(ImpactedCount, '/', Total)
| project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity,RecommendationId
| order by RecommendationId","size":0,"title":"Recommendation by Impact","queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"visualization":"tiles","sortBy":[],"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"Recommendation"},"subtitleContent":{"columnMatch":"type"},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"ImpactedResources","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"auto"},"tooltipFormat":{"tooltip":"Number of impacted resources / Total resources"}},"secondaryContent":{"columnMatch":"RecommendationId"},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto","styleSettings":{"borderStyle":"rounded"}}},"name":"visualImplementationImpact-Zone"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"(

        | extend ZoneConfigured = case(
            type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 0,
            type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', (tostring(sku.name) has_cs 'ZRS') or array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 0,
            type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
            type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
            type =~ 'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
            type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', tostring(properties.sku.tier) contains 'AZ',
            type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
            type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers', tolower(tostring(sku.name)) != 'basic' and array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) >= 2,
            type =~ 'microsoft.sql/servers/databases', tobool(properties.zoneRedundant),
            type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', not(properties.zonalAllocationPolicy != 'Automatic' and (isnull(zones) or array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) <= 1)),
            type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode) == 'ZoneRedundant',
            type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode) == 'ZoneRedundant',
            type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', tostring(sku.name) endswith_cs 'ZRS',
            type =~ 'Microsoft.NetApp/netAppAccounts/capacityPools/volumes', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 1,
            type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 1,
            type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', array_length(coalesce(todynamic(zones), dynamic([]))) > 1,
            type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', tobool(properties.zoneRedundant),
            type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', tobool(properties.zoneRedundant),
            type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', tobool(properties.zoneRedundant),
            type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', tostring(properties.zoneRedundancy) =~ 'Enabled',
            type =~ 'microsoft.app/managedenvironments', tostring(properties.zoneRedundant) !~ 'false',
            false)
        | project id, type, ZoneConfigured
    )
    | union (
        resources
        | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) and location in~ ({ZonalRegions}) and type =~ 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts'
        | mv-expand loc = properties.locations | extend z = tobool(loc.isZoneRedundant) | summarize ZoneConfigured = max(z) by id, type
    )
    | union (
        resources
        | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) and location in~ ({ZonalRegions}) and type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters'
        | mv-expand pool = properties.agentPoolProfiles | extend z = array_length(coalesce(pool.availabilityZones, dynamic([]))) > 1 | summarize ZoneConfigured = max(z) by id, type
    )
    | where not(ZoneConfigured)
    | extend Recommendation = case(
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines', 'Deploy VMs across Availability Zones',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks', 'Use Azure Disks with Zone Redundant Storage',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/applicationGateways', 'Enable multi-zone Application Gateway',
        type =~ 'microsoft.network/azurefirewalls', 'Deploy Azure Firewall across multiple availability zones',
        type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts', 'Move to ZRS/GZRS storage',
        type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms', 'Enable zone redundancy on App Service Plan',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', 'Use multi-zone AKS node pools',
        type =~ 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', 'Enable ACR zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', 'Enable multi-zone API Management',
        type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', 'Enable Service Bus zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.eventhub/namespaces', 'Enable Event Hub zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis', 'Enable Redis zone redundancy',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers', 'Enable MySQL zone-redundant HA',
        type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers', 'Enable PostgreSQL zone-redundant HA',
        type =~ 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts', 'Enable Cosmos DB zone redundancy',

        type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways', 'Use AZ SKU Virtual Network Gateway',

        type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets', 'Distribute VM Scale Set across zones',

    isnull(zones) or zoneCount <= 1, false,

| extend skuName = tostring(sku.name)
| extend skuTier = tostring(sku.tier)

    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags

)

    additionalMonthlyCost = 0.0

    tostring(zones),

**Monthly Cost Formula:**
- **Gateway Hours:** Application Gateway cost per hour × 730 hours
- **Capacity Units:** Capacity Unit cost per hour × 730 hours  
- **Data Transfer:** Tiered pricing based on monthly outbound data transfer

**Data Transfer Pricing Tiers:**
- First 100 GB: Free
- Next 10 TB: $0.04 per GB
- Next 40 TB: $0.08 per GB
- Next 100 TB: $0.04 per GB
- Next 350 TB: $0.065 per GB

**Default Assumptions:**
- Application Gateway: $0.125/hour
- Capacity Unit: $0.008/hour
- Outbound Data Transfer: 1,000 GB/month
- Pricing based on North America/Europe regions (September 2025)

You can adjust these parameters above to match your specific usage patterns and get a more accurate cost estimate.","style":"info"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"UdnerstandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"text-appgwcosts"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ "microsoft.network/applicationGateways"
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend locations = properties.locations
| extend zoneRedundant = iif(array_length(zones) >= 2, "true", "false")
| where zoneRedundant == "false"
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    )
    on id
// Cost calculation for outbound data transfer with tiered pricing
| extend outboundDataGB = todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb})
| extend dataTransferCost = case(
    outboundDataGB <= 100, 0.0,  // First 100 GB free
    outboundDataGB <= 10340, (outboundDataGB - 100) * 0.04,  // Next 10 TB at $0.04/GB
    outboundDataGB <= 51440, ((10340 - 100) * 0.04) + ((outboundDataGB - 10340) * 0.08),  // Next 40 TB at $0.08/GB
    outboundDataGB <= 153840, ((10340 - 100) * 0.04) + ((51440 - 10340) * 0.08) + ((outboundDataGB - 51440) * 0.04),  // Next 100 TB at $0.04/GB
    ((10340 - 100) * 0.04) + ((51440 - 10340) * 0.08) + ((153840 - 51440) * 0.04) + ((outboundDataGB - 153840) * 0.065)  // Next 350 TB at $0.065/GB
)
// Total cost calculation
| extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = (todouble({AppGWperhour}) * 730) + (todouble({CapacityUnitperhour}) * 730) + dataTransferCost
| extend 
    Recommendation = "Enable Application Gateway Zone Redundancy",
    ImplementationImpact = "High",
    ImplementationComplexity = "Medium"
| project Recommendation, name, location, EstimatedMonthlyCost, dataTransferCost, resourceGroup, 
         ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity, subscriptionId, zoneRedundant

| distinct id,name,zoneRedundant,ImplementationImpact,ImplementationComplexity,EstimatedCost,resourceGroup,subscriptionId,location","size":0,"noDataMessage":"All Azure Public IPs have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"false","representation":"failed","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"EstimatedCost","formatter":0,"numberFormat":{"unit":0,"options":{"style":"decimal"}}}]}},"name":"query-publicIPs"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforPublicIPs","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupPublicIp"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Azure Virtual Network Gateways🟢 [Cost Est.]","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Cost Estimate:** Monthly VPN Gateway upgrade cost to equivalent AZ SKU based on East US rates, September 2025. ]"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"Show Cost Calculation Details"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"265124d1-abff-4c14-ae87-56bae2ec3aaf","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"s2stunnels","label":"Number of Site-to-Site Tunnels","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"5"},{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"P2SConnections","label":"Number of Point-to-Site Connections","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"50","id":"eb065df2-ab87-43cb-a65b-8e354f861f3e"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"parameters - 1"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### How VPN Gateway Cost is Calculated

**Monthly Cost Formula:**
- **Base Gateway Cost:** Fixed monthly cost based on AZ SKU tier
- **Additional S2S Tunnels:** $0.015/hour for tunnels beyond included limit
- **Additional P2S Connections:** $0.01/hour for connections beyond 128

**SKU Mapping & Base Costs:**
- Basic/Standard → VpnGw1AZ: $153.30/month
- VpnGw1 → VpnGw1AZ: $153.30/month  
- VpnGw2 → VpnGw2AZ: $394.20/month
- VpnGw3 → VpnGw3AZ: $1,007.40/month
- VpnGw4 → VpnGw4AZ: $1,686.30/month
- VpnGw5 → VpnGw5AZ: $2,934.60/month

**Included Limits:**
- **S2S Tunnels:** First 10 included (VpnGw1-3AZ), first 10 included (VpnGw4-5AZ supports up to 100)
- **P2S Connections:** First 128 included for all SKUs

**Calculation Example:**
- VpnGw2AZ base cost: $394.20/month
- 5 S2S tunnels: Free (within 10 limit)
- 50 P2S connections: Free (within 128 limit)  
- Total monthly cost: $394.20

**Default Assumptions:**
- S2S Tunnels: 5 tunnels
- P2S Connections: 50 connections
- East US pricing (September 2025)

You can adjust these parameters above to match your specific gateway configuration.","style":"info"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"text - 2"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ "microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways"
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend skuName = tostring(properties.sku.name)
| extend skuTier = tostring(properties.sku.tier)
| extend skuCapacity = toint(properties.sku.capacity)
| extend gatewayType = tostring(properties.gatewayType)
| extend locations = properties.locations
| extend zoneRedundant = iif(skuName contains 'AZ' or skuTier contains 'AZ', "true", "false")
| where zoneRedundant == "false"
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | distinct id
    )
    on id
// Map current SKU to equivalent AZ SKU and calculate costs
| extend equivalentAZSku = case(
    skuName =~ "VpnGw1" or skuTier =~ "VpnGw1", "VpnGw1AZ",
    skuName =~ "VpnGw2" or skuTier =~ "VpnGw2", "VpnGw2AZ", 
    skuName =~ "VpnGw3" or skuTier =~ "VpnGw3", "VpnGw3AZ",
    skuName =~ "VpnGw4" or skuTier =~ "VpnGw4", "VpnGw4AZ",
    skuName =~ "VpnGw5" or skuTier =~ "VpnGw5", "VpnGw5AZ",
    skuName =~ "Standard" or skuTier =~ "Standard", "VpnGw1AZ",  // Map Standard to VpnGw1AZ
    skuName =~ "Basic" or skuTier =~ "Basic", "VpnGw1AZ",      // Map Basic to VpnGw1AZ
    "VpnGw1AZ"  // Default fallback
)
// Base gateway monthly costs
| extend baseGatewayCost = case(
    equivalentAZSku =~ "VpnGw1AZ", 153.30,
    equivalentAZSku =~ "VpnGw2AZ", 394.20,
    equivalentAZSku =~ "VpnGw3AZ", 1007.40,
    equivalentAZSku =~ "VpnGw4AZ", 1686.30,
    equivalentAZSku =~ "VpnGw5AZ", 2934.60,
    153.30  // Default to VpnGw1AZ cost
)
// Calculate additional tunnel costs (S2S)
| extend s2sTunnels = todouble({s2stunnels})
| extend s2sTunnelCost = case(
    s2sTunnels <= 10, 0.0,  // First 10 included
    equivalentAZSku in~ ("VpnGw1AZ", "VpnGw2AZ", "VpnGw3AZ") and s2sTunnels <= 30, (s2sTunnels - 10) * 0.015 * 730,  // 11-30 tunnels
    equivalentAZSku in~ ("VpnGw4AZ", "VpnGw5AZ") and s2sTunnels <= 100, (s2sTunnels - 10) * 0.015 * 730,  // 11-100 tunnels
    0.0  // Over limit or other cases
)
// Calculate additional connection costs (P2S)
| extend p2sConnections = todouble({P2SConnections})
| extend p2sConnectionCost = case(
    p2sConnections <= 128, 0.0,  // First 128 included
    (p2sConnections - 128) * 0.01 * 730  // Additional connections at $0.01/hour
)
// Total estimated monthly cost
| extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = baseGatewayCost + s2sTunnelCost + p2sConnectionCost
| extend 
    Recommendation = strcat("Upgrade to ", equivalentAZSku, " for Zone Redundancy"),
    ImplementationImpact = "High",
    ImplementationComplexity = "High"
| project name,  resourceGroup,skuName, zoneRedundant,Recommendation, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity, equivalentAZSku, location, 
         EstimatedMonthlyCost, baseGatewayCost, s2sTunnelCost, p2sConnectionCost,
         subscriptionId 
| sort by name asc","size":0,"noDataMessage":"All Azure Virtual Network Gateways have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"false","representation":"failed","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"}]}}],"rowLimit":1000,"filter":true,"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"skuName","label":"Current SKU"}]}},"name":"query-virtual-network-gateway-zones"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforVPNGW","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groups2svpn"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Azure Bastion Hosts🟢 [Cost Est.]","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Note:** Cost based on East US rates (Sep 2025). Zone redundancy available at no additional cost but requires redeployment. For detailed pricing, see [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/calculator/).","style":"upsell"},"name":"text - 1"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.network/bastionhosts'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend zoneCount = array_length(zones)
| extend zoneRedundant = case(
    isnull(zones) or zoneCount <= 1, false,
    true
)
| extend skuName = tostring(sku.name)
| where zoneRedundant == false  // Only non-zone-redundant instances
| join kind = innerunique (
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId = id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
)
    on id
| extend 
    Recommendation = "Redeploy Bastion with zone redundancy enabled (no additional cost)",
    ImplementationImpact = "High",
    ImplementationComplexity = "Medium",
    CostImpact = "None",
    additionalMonthlyCost = 0.0
| project 
    name, 
    skuName,
    zoneCount,
    tostring(zones),
    resourceGroup, 
        Recommendation, 
    ImplementationImpact, 
    ImplementationComplexity, 
    CostImpact,
    location, 
    subscriptionId","size":0,"noDataMessage":"All Azure Bastion Hosts have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"false","representation":"failed","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"}]}}],"rowLimit":1000}},"name":"query-bastion-zone-details"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforBastion","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupBastion"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Azure Standard Load Balancer🟢 [Cost Est.]","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Cost Estimate:** Monthly Load Balancer cost (Rules + Data Processing) based on East US Regional Tier rates, September 2025. Assumes 5 rules, 1TB/month data processing. For precise costs, see the [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/).","style":"upsell"},"name":"text - 4"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"understand-cost-calc-yesno","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"understandCostCalculations","label":"Show Load Balancer cost calculation details?","type":2,"isRequired":true,"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[],"showDefault":false},"jsonData":"[
    {

    "label" : "Yes"
    },
    {
    "value" : "No",
    "label" : "No",
    "selected" : true
    }
]"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"Show Cost Calculation Details"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"a1a1ed79-dd3e-4c78-bde6-2427b0606874","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"NetworkRules","label":"Number of rules configured","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"1"},{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"DataProcessedGb","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"1000","label":"Amount of data processed in GB","id":"1816b0b4-55eb-4c0e-a855-143ad394a343"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"param-LBPrice"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### How Load Balancer Cost is Calculated

**Monthly Cost Formula:**
- **Network Rules:** Tiered pricing based on number of rules
- **Data Processing:** $0.005 per GB of processed data

**Network Rules Pricing Tiers:**
- First 5 rules: $0.025/hour each
- Additional rules: $0.01/hour each
- Inbound NAT rules: Free

**Calculation Example:**
- 8 rules = (5 × $0.025 × 730) + (3 × $0.01 × 730) = $91.25 + $21.90 = $113.15/month
- 1,000 GB data processing = 1,000 × $0.005 = $5.00/month
- Total monthly cost = $113.15 + $5.00 = $118.15

**Default Assumptions:**
- Network Rules: 5 rules
- Data Processed: 1,000 GB/month
- Regional Tier pricing (East US, September 2025)

You can adjust these parameters above to match your specific load balancer configuration and get a more accurate cost estimate.","style":"info"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"text - 3"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ "microsoft.network/loadbalancers" and tolower(sku.name) != 'basic'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend locations = properties.locations
| extend zones = zones
| extend zoneRedundant = iif(array_length(zones) >= 2, "true", "false")
| where zoneRedundant == "false"
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | distinct id  // Add this line to deduplicate before join
    )
    on id
// Cost calculation for Load Balancer rules with tiered pricing
| extend networkRules = todouble({NetworkRules})
| extend dataProcessedGB = todouble({DataProcessedGb})
| extend rulesCost = case(
    networkRules <= 5, networkRules * 0.025 * 730,  // First 5 rules at $0.025/hour
    (5 * 0.025 * 730) + ((networkRules - 5) * 0.01 * 730)  // First 5 + additional at $0.01/hour
)
| extend dataProcessingCost = dataProcessedGB * 0.005  // $0.005 per GB
| extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = rulesCost + dataProcessingCost
| extend 
    Recommendation = "Enable Load Balancer Zone Redundancy",
    ImplementationImpact = "High",
    ImplementationComplexity = "Medium"
| project Recommendation, name, location, zoneRedundant, EstimatedMonthlyCost, rulesCost, dataProcessingCost, 
         resourceGroup, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity, subscriptionId
| sort by name asc","size":0,"noDataMessage":"All Azure Standard Load Balanacers have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"false","representation":"failed","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"}]}}],"rowLimit":1000}},"name":"query-load-balancer-zone-details"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforLB","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupLoadBalancer"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedDetailsTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"network"},"name":"group-networking-details"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Data Service Availability Zone Coverage","items":[{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend 
    highAvailabilityMode = tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode),
    skuName = tostring(sku.name),
    skuTier = tostring(sku.tier),
    storageSizeGB = toint(properties.storage.storageSizeGB),
    postgresVersion = strcat(tostring(properties.version), ".", tostring(properties.minorVersion))
| extend 
    supportsZoneRedundancy = case(
        skuTier =~ 'Burstable', false,  // Burstable tier doesn't support zone redundancy
        true  // General Purpose and Memory Optimized support it
    )
| extend 
    zoneRedundant = case(
        highAvailabilityMode != "ZoneRedundant", false, true 
    )
| where zoneRedundant == false  // Only non-zone-redundant servers
| extend 
    recommendation = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), strcat("Upgrade from Burstable tier to General Purpose or Memory Optimized for zone redundancy support (Current: ", skuTier, ")"),
        "Enable zone-redundant high availability"
    ),
    minimumUpgradeTarget = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), "General Purpose or Memory Optimized tier",
        "Current tier with zone redundancy enabled"
    )
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    )
    on id
| extend 
    Recommendation = recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), 'High',  // Requires tier upgrade
        'High'  // Zone redundancy has performance/cost impact but unknown amount
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), 'Medium',  // Tier upgrade complexity
        'Low'  // Configuration change
    )
| project 
    PostgreSQLServerName = name,
    CurrentSKU = skuName,
    SKUTier = skuTier,
    StorageSizeGB = storageSizeGB,
    SupportsZoneRedundancy = supportsZoneRedundancy,
    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup,
    Recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    PostgreSQLVersion = postgresVersion,
    CurrentHAMode = highAvailabilityMode,
    MinimumUpgradeTarget = minimumUpgradeTarget,
    Location = location,
    SubscriptionId = subscriptionId
| sort by PostgreSQLServerName asc","size":0,"title":"Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server [🔴No Cost Est.]","noDataMessage":"All Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server instances have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"pinnedZone","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}},{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}}],"rowLimit":1000},"sortBy":[]},"name":"query-dbforpostgresql-zones-details"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Note:** Zone redundancy costs vary by workload, SKU type, and region due to synchronous replication overhead. Use [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/) for accurate cost projections based on your specific configuration.","style":"info"},"name":"text-postgresql-cost-disclaimer"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforPostgres","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupPostgres"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"parameters":[{"id":"14bb128f-5b3f-421a-9cf7-b9ad71ece3f6","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"CheckforSQLServer","type":1,"isRequired":true,"query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.sql/servers/databases'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| where name != 'master'  // Exclude system databases

Use the [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/) for accurate cost projections based on your specific configuration and location.","style":"upsell"},"name":"text-sql-cost-disclaimer"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## Cost Estimation Disclaimer

**Note:** Cost estimates for SQL Database tier upgrades are not included in this analysis due to the complexity and variability of pricing factors:

• **Variable Pricing Models**: SQL Database pricing varies significantly between DTU and vCore models, with different rates for compute, storage, and backup resources
• **Regional Price Differences**: Costs vary substantially across Azure regions and may change based on your specific location
• **Custom Configurations**: Actual costs depend on storage size, backup retention policies, read replicas, and other configuration options
• **Promotional Pricing**: Microsoft frequently offers reserved instance discounts, hybrid benefits, and other cost optimization programs that affect final pricing
• **Dynamic Scaling**: Many deployments use auto-scaling features that make cost prediction highly variable

**For Accurate Cost Estimates:**

Use the [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/) to estimate upgrade costs based on your specific requirements:

1. Select **Databases** → **Azure SQL Database**
2. Configure your current database specifications
3. Compare with the recommended zone-redundant tier
4. Factor in your region, storage needs, and backup requirements

**Alternative:** Consider using [Azure Cost Management](https://portal.azure.com/#view/Microsoft_Azure_CostManagement) to analyze your current SQL Database spending patterns and project upgrade costs based on historical usage."},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"Alwayshidden","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"true"},"name":"text-sql-cost-disclaimer"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.sql/servers/databases'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| where name != 'master'  // Exclude system databases
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend zoneRedundant = tobool(properties.zoneRedundant)
| where not(zoneRedundant)  // Only non-zone-redundant databases
| extend 
    skuName = tostring(sku.name),
    skuTier = tostring(sku.tier),
    skuCapacity = toint(sku.capacity),
    currentServiceObjective = tostring(properties.currentServiceObjectiveName)
| extend 
    purchaseModel = case(
        skuTier in~ ('Basic', 'Standard', 'Premium'), 'DTU',
        skuTier in~ ('GeneralPurpose', 'BusinessCritical', 'Hyperscale'), 'vCore',
        'Unknown'
    )
| extend 
    currentlySupportsZones = case(
        // Based on official documentation
        skuTier =~ 'Basic', false,
        skuTier =~ 'Standard', false,  
        skuTier =~ 'Premium', true,
        skuTier =~ 'GeneralPurpose', true,
        skuTier =~ 'BusinessCritical', true,
        skuTier =~ 'Hyperscale', true,
        false
    )
| extend 
    recommendedAction = case(
        currentlySupportsZones, 'Enable zone redundancy on current tier',
        skuTier =~ 'Basic', 'Upgrade to Premium P1 (DTU) or GP_Gen5_2 (vCore) for zone redundancy',
        skuTier =~ 'Standard', 'Upgrade to Premium P1 (DTU) or GP_Gen5_2 (vCore) for zone redundancy',
        'Enable zone redundancy'  // For tiers that already support it
    ),
    minimumUpgradeTarget = case(
        currentlySupportsZones, 'Current tier with zone redundancy enabled',
        skuTier =~ 'Basic', 'Premium P1 (DTU) or General Purpose 2 vCore',
        skuTier =~ 'Standard', 'Premium P1 (DTU) or General Purpose 2 vCore', 
        'Current tier with zone redundancy'
    )
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    )
    on id
| extend 
    Recommendation = recommendedAction,
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        currentlySupportsZones, 'Medium',  // Just enabling zone redundancy
        'High'  // Requires tier upgrade
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        currentlySupportsZones, 'Low',   // Simple configuration change
        'Medium'  // Requires tier change and potential downtime
    )
| extend estimatedCost="NaN"
| project 
    DatabaseName = name, 
    Recommendation, 
    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup, 
    ImplementationImpact, 
    ImplementationComplexity, 
    Location = location, 
    CurrentTier = skuTier,
    CurrentSKU = skuName,
    SKUCapacity = skuCapacity,
    PurchaseModel = purchaseModel,
    MinimumUpgradeTarget = minimumUpgradeTarget,
    estimatedCost,    
    SubscriptionId = subscriptionId  
| sort by DatabaseName asc","size":0,"noDataMessage":"All Azure SQL Servers have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"failed","text":"{0}{1}"}]}}]}},"name":"query-az-sql-zones-details"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforSQLServer","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupSQLServer"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Azure Cosmos DB [🟡Cost Impact]","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Note:** Cosmos DB availability zone costs: Multi-region write accounts have no additional cost. Single-region accounts have 1.25x RU/s multiplier (free for autoscale) or 1.25x RU consumption (serverless). Use [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/) for precise cost estimates.","style":"upsell"},"name":"text-cosmos-cost-disclaimer"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend locations=properties.locations
| mv-expand cosmosLocation = locations
| extend zones=cosmosLocation.isZoneRedundant
| extend zoneRedundant = case(
    not(zones), false, true 
  )
| where zoneRedundant == false  // Only non-zone-redundant accounts
| extend 
    multiRegionWrites = tobool(properties.enableMultipleWriteLocations),
    regionCount = array_length(properties.locations),
    consistencyLevel = tostring(properties.consistencyPolicy.defaultConsistencyLevel),
    // Extract SKU information
    skuName = tostring(sku.name),
    skuTier = tostring(sku.tier),
    // Extract capabilities first
    capabilities = tostring(properties.capabilities),
    // Extract backup policy for additional context
    backupPolicy = tostring(properties.backupPolicy.type)
| extend 
    // Now use capabilities variable to detect modes
    isServerless = capabilities contains "EnableServerless",
    hasAutoscale = capabilities contains "EnableAutoscale" or capabilities contains "autoscale"
| extend 
    capacityMode = case(
        isServerless, "Serverless",
        hasAutoscale, "Provisioned (Autoscale)",
        "Provisioned (Manual)"
    ),
    accountType = case(
        multiRegionWrites and regionCount > 1, "Multi-region write",
        regionCount > 1, "Multi-region read",
        "Single-region"
    )
| extend 
    costImpact = case(
        multiRegionWrites, "No additional cost - Multi-region write accounts have no billing impact",
        isServerless, "25% increase in request units (RU) consumption",
        hasAutoscale, "25% increase in provisioned RU/s - FREE for autoscale resources",
        "25% increase in provisioned RU/s (1.25x multiplier)"
    ),
    costMultiplier = case(
        multiRegionWrites, "1.0x (No impact)",
        isServerless, "1.25x RU",
        hasAutoscale, "1.0x (Free for autoscale)",
        "1.25x RU/s"
    ),
    recommendedAction = case(
        multiRegionWrites, "Enable availability zones (no cost impact)",
        isServerless, "Enable availability zones (25% RU consumption increase)",
        hasAutoscale, "Enable availability zones (FREE - no cost impact for autoscale)",
        "Enable availability zones (25% RU/s increase) - Consider autoscale to avoid cost"
    )
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    )
    on id
| extend 
    Recommendation = recommendedAction,
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        multiRegionWrites or hasAutoscale, 'High',  // No cost impact
        isServerless, 'High',  // 25% RU increase
        'High'  // 25% RU/s increase
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = 'Low'  // Configuration change only
| project 
    CosmosDBAccount = name,
    AccountType = accountType,
    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup,
    CapacityMode = capacityMode,
    Recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    MultiRegionWrites = multiRegionWrites,
    RegionCount = regionCount,
    CostMultiplier = costMultiplier,
    CostImpactDescription = costImpact,
    Location = location,
    SubscriptionId = subscriptionId
| distinct *
| sort by CosmosDBAccount asc","size":0,"noDataMessage":"All Azure Cosmos DB instances have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"pinnedZone","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}},{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}}],"rowLimit":1000},"sortBy":[]},"name":"query-documentdb-zones-details"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforCosmosDB","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupCosmosDB"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Azure Cache for Redis[🔴No Cost Est.]","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Note:** Zone redundancy costs vary significantly based on replica configuration, data transfer usage, and clustering setup. Use [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/) for accurate cost projections based on your specific cache configuration.","style":"upsell"},"name":"text-redis-cost-disclaimer"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend 
    skuName = tostring(properties.sku.name),
    skuFamily = tostring(properties.sku.family),
    skuCapacity = toint(properties.sku.capacity),
    redisVersion = tostring(properties.redisVersion)
| extend 
    supportsZoneRedundancy = case(
        skuName in~ ('Basic', 'Standard'), false,
        skuName in~ ('Premium', 'Enterprise', 'EnterpriseFlash'), true,
        false  // Default for unknown SKUs
    )
| extend 
    currentZoneRedundant = case(
        properties.zonalAllocationPolicy != "Automatic" and (array_length(zones) <= 1 or isnull(zones)), false, 
        true 
    )
| extend 
    recommendation = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), strcat("Upgrade to Premium SKU or higher for zone redundancy support (Current: ", skuName, " C", skuCapacity, ")"),
        currentZoneRedundant, "Already zone redundant",
        "Enable zone redundancy on current SKU"
    ),
    minimumUpgradeTarget = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), "Premium P1 (or higher)",
        "Current SKU with zone redundancy enabled"
    )
| where not(currentZoneRedundant)  // Only show non-zone-redundant instances
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    )
    on id
| extend 
    Recommendation = recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), 'High',  // Requires SKU upgrade
        'High'  // Just enable zone redundancy
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), 'Medium',  // SKU upgrade complexity
        'Low'  // Configuration change
    )
| project 
    RedisCacheName = name,
    CurrentSKU = strcat(skuName, " ", skuFamily, skuCapacity),
    RedisVersion = redisVersion,
    SupportsZoneRedundancy = supportsZoneRedundancy,
    MinimumUpgradeTarget = minimumUpgradeTarget,
    CurrentZones = tostring(zones),
    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup,
    Recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    Location = location,
    SubscriptionId = subscriptionId
| sort by RedisCacheName asc","size":0,"noDataMessage":"All Azure Cache for Redis instances have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"SupportsZoneRedundancy","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"3","text":"No"}]}},{"columnMatch":"pinnedZone","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}},{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}}],"rowLimit":1000},"sortBy":[]},"name":"query-cache-zones-details"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforRediss","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupCacheforRedis"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server [🟡Cost Impact]","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Note:** Zone-redundant HA doubles compute and storage costs (100% increase) plus potential backup storage. Use [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/) for precise cost estimates including backup storage.","style":"upsell"},"name":"text-mysql-cost-disclaimer"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)

| extend 
    highAvailabilityMode = tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode),
    skuName = tostring(sku.name),
    skuTier = tostring(sku.tier),
    storageSizeGB = toint(properties.storage.storageSizeGB),
    mysqlVersion = tostring(properties.version)
| extend 
    zoneRedundant = case(
        highAvailabilityMode != "ZoneRedundant", false, true 
    )
| where zoneRedundant == false  // Only non-zone-redundant servers
| extend 
    costImpact = "100% increase (2x current cost) - Requires duplicate compute and storage for secondary replica",
    costMultiplier = "2.0x (Double current cost)",
    recommendedAction = "Enable zone-redundant high availability"
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    )
    on id
| extend 
    Recommendation = recommendedAction,
    ImplementationImpact = 'High',  // 100% cost increase
    ImplementationComplexity = 'High'  // Configuration change
| project 
    MySQLServerName = name,
    CurrentSKU = skuName,
    SKUTier = skuTier,
    StorageSizeGB = storageSizeGB,

    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup,
    Recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact,
    CostMultiplier = costMultiplier,
    CostImpactDescription = costImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    Location = location,
    SubscriptionId = subscriptionId

| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/StorageAccounts'
| where kind == "StorageV2"
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend locations = properties.locations
| extend skuName = tostring(sku.name)
| extend zoneRedundant = case(sku.name endswith_cs 'ZRS', true, false)
| join kind = innerunique (
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags

DiskPricing"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// Managed Disks Zone Redundancy Analysis
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.compute/disks'
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId)
| extend skuName = tostring(sku.name)
| extend diskSizeGB = toint(properties.diskSizeGB)
| extend supportsZoneRedundancy = case(
    skuName in ('Premium_LRS', 'StandardSSD_LRS'), true,  // Can upgrade to Premium_ZRS, StandardSSD_ZRS
    skuName in ('Premium_ZRS', 'StandardSSD_ZRS'), true,  // Already zone redundant capable
    false  // Ultra, Premium SSD v2, Standard_LRS don't support ZRS
)
| extend currentlyZoneRedundant = skuName in ('Premium_ZRS', 'StandardSSD_ZRS')
| where supportsZoneRedundancy == false or currentlyZoneRedundant == false  // Need action
| extend recommendedSku = case(
    skuName == "Premium_LRS", "Premium_ZRS",
    skuName == "StandardSSD_LRS", "StandardSSD_ZRS", 
    skuName == "Standard_LRS", "StandardSSD_ZRS",  // Upgrade Standard to StandardSSD_ZRS
    skuName in ('UltraSSD_LRS', 'PremiumV2_LRS'), "Migrate to Premium_ZRS",  // These don't support ZRS
    "StandardSSD_ZRS"  // Default fallback
)
| extend currentMonthlyCost = case(
    skuName == "Premium_LRS", todouble({premiumSsdPricePerGB}) * diskSizeGB,
    skuName == "StandardSSD_LRS", todouble({standardSsdPricePerGB}) * diskSizeGB,
    skuName == "Standard_LRS", todouble({standardHddPricePerGB}) * diskSizeGB,
    skuName == "UltraSSD_LRS", 0.0,  // Complex pricing, not calculated
    skuName == "PremiumV2_LRS", 0.0,  // Complex pricing, not calculated
    0.0
)
| extend targetMonthlyCost = case(
    recommendedSku == "Premium_ZRS", todouble({premiumZrsPricePerGB}) * diskSizeGB,
    recommendedSku == "StandardSSD_ZRS", todouble({standardSsdZrsPricePerGB}) * diskSizeGB,
    0.0  // For migration scenarios
)
| extend additionalMonthlyCost = targetMonthlyCost - currentMonthlyCost
| extend 
    Recommendation = case(
        skuName in ('UltraSSD_LRS', 'PremiumV2_LRS'), "Migrate to zone-redundant disk type (ZRS not supported for Ultra/Premium v2)",
        currentlyZoneRedundant == false and supportsZoneRedundancy == true, strcat("Upgrade to ", recommendedSku),
        "Enable zone redundancy"
    ),
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        additionalMonthlyCost == 0.0, "High",  // Migration required
        additionalMonthlyCost <= 10.0, "Low",
        additionalMonthlyCost <= 50.0, "High",
        "High"
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        skuName in ('UltraSSD_LRS', 'PremiumV2_LRS'), "High",  // Migration required
        "Medium"  // Disk type change
    )
| join kind = innerunique (
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId = id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
)
    on id
| project 
    name,
    skuName,
    recommendedSku,
    diskSizeGB,
    currentMonthlyCost = round(currentMonthlyCost, 2),
    resourceGroup,
    Recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    targetMonthlyCost = round(targetMonthlyCost, 2),
    additionalMonthlyCost = round(additionalMonthlyCost, 2),
    location,
    subscriptionId
| sort by additionalMonthlyCost desc","size":0,"noDataMessage":"All disks have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"resiliencyLevel","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"Zone-Redudant","representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"Zonal","representation":"2","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"Regional","representation":"4","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"resourceGroup","formatter":14,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":null,"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"subscriptionId","formatter":15,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":null,"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"failed","text":""}]}}],"rowLimit":1000,"filter":true,"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"skuName","sortOrder":1}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"skuName","sortOrder":1}]},"name":"query-disks-zones-details"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**🟢 [Cost Est.] How Managed Disk Zone Redundancy Cost is Calculated**

**Monthly Cost Formula:**
• **Disk Cost**: {Disk Size GB} × {Price per GB per month}

**SKU Upgrade Mapping:**
• Standard_LRS → StandardSSD_ZRS
• StandardSSD_LRS → StandardSSD_ZRS  
• Premium_LRS → Premium_ZRS
• Ultra/Premium v2 → Migration required (ZRS not supported)

**Price per GB (East US):**
• Standard_LRS: ${standardHddPricePerGB}/GB/month
• StandardSSD_LRS: ${standardSsdPricePerGB}/GB/month
• Premium_LRS: ${premiumSsdPricePerGB}/GB/month
• StandardSSD_ZRS: ${standardSsdZrsPricePerGB}/GB/month
• Premium_ZRS: ${premiumZrsPricePerGB}/GB/month

**Calculation Example:**
• 127GB Standard_LRS disk: 127 × ${standardHddPricePerGB} = ${currentCost}/month
• Upgrade to StandardSSD_ZRS: 127 × ${standardSsdZrsPricePerGB} = ${targetCost}/month
• Additional cost: ${additionalCost}/month

**Default Assumptions:**
• Disk size from resource properties
• East US pricing (September 2025)","style":"info"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"textDiskCostCalculation"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforDisk","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupDisk"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Azure Virtual Machines🟡 [Cost Impact]","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"Note: Cost based on East US rates (Sep 2025). VM compute cost multipliers only — excludes storage, networking, and licensing costs. For detailed pricing, see [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/).","style":"upsell"},"name":"text - 1"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// Virtual Machines Zone Redundancy Analysis
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId)
| extend vmSize = tostring(properties.hardwareProfile.vmSize)
| extend pinnedZone = case(
    isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) == 0, false, 
    true 
)
| where pinnedZone == false  // Only VMs not pinned to zones
| extend 
    Recommendation = "Deploy additional VM instances across multiple availability zones",
    CostImpactGuidance = "100-200% increase: Deploy 2-3 instances across zones instead of single instance",
    ImplementationImpact = "High",     // Significant cost increase
    ImplementationComplexity = "Medium"  // Requires architecture changes
| join kind = innerunique (
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId = id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
)
    on id
| project 
    name,
    vmSize,
    pinnedZone,
    zones = tostring(zones),
    CostImpactGuidance,
    resourceGroup,
    Recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    location,
    subscriptionId
| sort by name asc","size":0,"noDataMessage":"All Virtual Machines have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"pinnedZone","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}},{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}}],"rowLimit":1000},"sortBy":[]},"name":"query-vms-zones-details"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforVMs","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupVM"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Azure Virtual Machines Scale Sets🟢 [No additional cost.]","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"Note: Cost estimates based on instance scaling requirements for zone redundancy. Single instance VMSS require additional VM for minimum zone coverage. Multi-instance VMSS can rebalance existing VMs across zones at no additional compute cost. For detailed pricing, see [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/).","style":"upsell"},"name":"textVMSS note"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// Standalone VM Scale Sets - Corrected Cost Impact Logic
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets'
//| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId)
| extend isAKSManaged = case(
    tags has "aks-managed-orchestrator" or name startswith "aks-", true,
    false
)
| where isAKSManaged == false
| extend currentZoneRedundant = case(
    isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) <= 1, false,
    true
)
| where currentZoneRedundant == false
| extend skuName = tostring(sku.name)
| extend currentCapacity = toint(sku.capacity)
| extend orchestrationMode = tostring(properties.orchestrationMode)
| extend 
    targetCapacity = case(
        currentCapacity <= 1, 2,  // Need minimum 2 for zone redundancy
        currentCapacity  // Keep existing capacity, just rebalance
    ),
    hasCapacityIncrease = case(
        currentCapacity <= 1, true,
        false
    )
| extend 
    Recommendation = case(
        hasCapacityIncrease, strcat("Deploy ", name, " across multiple availability zones with ", tostring(targetCapacity), " instances"),
        strcat("Rebalance ", name, " existing ", tostring(currentCapacity), " instances across multiple availability zones")
    ),
    CostImpact = case(
        hasCapacityIncrease, "🟡 100% compute cost increase - minimum 2 instances required for zone redundancy",
        "🟢 No cost impact - rebalance existing VMs across availability zones"
    ),
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        hasCapacityIncrease, "High",  // Additional instances
        "Low"  // Just rebalancing
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = "Medium"  // Requires VMSS reconfiguration
| join kind = innerunique (
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}'])
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | distinct id
) on id
| project 
    VMSSName = name,
    Location = location,
    SKU = skuName,
    CurrentCapacity = currentCapacity,
    TargetCapacity = targetCapacity,
    OrchestrationMode = orchestrationMode,
    CurrentZones = zones,
    Recommendation,
    CostImpact,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    ResourceGroup = split(resourceGroup, '/')[4],
    SubscriptionId = split(subscriptionId, '/')[2]
| sort by VMSSName asc","size":0,"noDataMessage":"All Virtual Machines Scale Sets have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"pinnedZone","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}},{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}}],"rowLimit":1000},"sortBy":[]},"name":"query-vmss-zones-details"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforVMSS","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupVMSS"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedDetailsTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"compute"},"name":"group - Details-Compute"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Integration Services Availability Zone Coverage","items":[{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"parameters":[{"id":"14bb128f-5b3f-421a-9cf7-b9ad71ece3f6","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"CheckforEventHub","type":1,"isRequired":true,"query":"resources

| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend zoneRedundant = case(
    isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) <= 1, false, 
    true 
)
| extend skuName = tostring(sku.name)
| extend skuCapacity = toint(sku.capacity)
| where zoneRedundant == false  // Only non-zone-redundant instances
| join kind = innerunique (
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId = id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
)
    on id
| extend 
    canEnableZoneRedundancy = case(
        skuName == 'Premium', true,
        false
    ),
    upgradeRequired = case(
        skuName == 'Developer' or skuName == 'Basic' or skuName == 'Standard', true,
        false
    ),
    premiumUnits = case(
        skuName == 'Developer' or skuName == 'Basic' or skuName == 'Standard', max_of(1, skuCapacity),
        skuCapacity
    )
| extend 
    monthlyPremiumCost = todouble(premiumUnits) * todouble({apimPremiumUnitPrice}) * 730.0,
    currentMonthlyCost = case(
        skuName == 'Developer', todouble({apimDeveloperPrice}) * 730.0,
        skuName == 'Basic', todouble(skuCapacity) * todouble({apimBasicUnitPrice}) * 730.0,
        skuName == 'Standard', todouble(skuCapacity) * todouble({apimStandardUnitPrice}) * 730.0,
        skuName == 'Premium', todouble(skuCapacity) * todouble({apimPremiumUnitPrice}) * 730.0,
        0.0
    )
| extend 
    estimatedAdditionalMonthlyCost = case(
        upgradeRequired, monthlyPremiumCost - currentMonthlyCost,
        0.0
    )
| extend 
    Recommendation = case(
        not(canEnableZoneRedundancy) and upgradeRequired, "Upgrade to Premium tier and enable zone redundancy",
        canEnableZoneRedundancy, "Enable zone redundancy (requires redeployment)",
        "Zone redundancy not supported for this tier"
    ),
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        upgradeRequired, "High",
        "Medium"
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        upgradeRequired, "High",
        "Medium"
    ),
    CostImpact = case(
        upgradeRequired, "High",
        "None"
    )
| project 
    name, 
    skuName, 
    skuCapacity,
    canEnableZoneRedundancy,
    upgradeRequired,
    resourceGroup, 
        Recommendation, 
    ImplementationImpact, 
    ImplementationComplexity, 
        estimatedAdditionalMonthlyCost,
    location, 
    subscriptionId","size":0,"noDataMessage":"All Azure API Management services have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"canEnableZoneRedundancy","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"3","text":"No"}]}},{"columnMatch":"pinnedZone","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}},{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}}],"rowLimit":1000},"sortBy":[]},"name":"query-apiManagement-zones-details"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforAPIM","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupAPIM"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Azure Service Bus🟢 [Cost Est.] No additional cost","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Note:** Cost based on East US rates (Sep 2025).     SubscriptionId=subscriptionId,
    Location=location
