App Service Zone Redundancy Cost is Calculated** 🟢 [Cost Est.]

**Monthly Cost Formula:**
- **Tier Upgrade Cost**: Upgrade to Premium v4 (cheapest zone-redundant option)
- **Instance Minimum**: Minimum 2 instances required for zone redundancy
- **No Additional AZ Cost**: Zone redundancy included in Premium v4 pricing

**Upgrade Path (to Premium v4):**
- Basic/Standard → P0v4: $53.29/month per instance
- Premium v1 → Equivalent v4: Cost varies by tier
- Premium v2/v3 → Equivalent v4: Usually cost reduction
- Existing v4: No upgrade needed, just enable AZ

**Instance Requirements:**
- **Minimum 2 instances** enforced for zone redundancy
- If current plan has 1 instance → 2x cost impact
- Zone balancing across 3 availability zones
- Auto-scaling maintains zone distribution

**Cost Impact Examples:**
- Basic B1 (1 instance) → P0v4 (2 instances): ~$106.58/month
- Standard S1 (1 instance) → P0v4 (2 instances): ~$106.58/month  
- Premium P1 (1 instance) → P1v4 (2 instances): ~$213.16/month
- Premium P1v4 (1 instance) → P1v4 (2 instances): +$106.58/month

**Implementation Notes:**
- Requires App Service plan recreation or migration
- Brief downtime during plan migration
- All apps automatically inherit zone redundancy
- Performance improvements with v4 generation

**Default Assumptions:**
- East US pricing (September 2025)
- Pay-as-you-go pricing (no reservations)
- Minimum 2-instance configuration
- Linux pricing model"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"textCostAppService"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.web/serverfarms'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend zoneRedundant = tobool(properties.zoneRedundant)
| extend skuName = tostring(sku.name)
| extend skuTier = tostring(sku.tier)
| extend skuSize = tostring(sku.size)
| extend currentCapacity = toint(sku.capacity)
| extend numberOfWorkers = toint(properties.numberOfWorkers)
| extend maximumNumberOfZones = toint(properties.maximumNumberOfZones)
| where skuName != "Y1"
| where zoneRedundant == false  // Only non-zone-redundant instances
| join kind = innerunique (
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId = id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
)
    on id
| extend 
    supportsZoneRedundancy = case(
        skuTier == "Premium" and (skuName startswith "P" and (skuName contains "v2" or skuName contains "v3" or skuName contains "v4")), true,
        skuTier == "PremiumV2", true,
        skuTier == "PremiumV3", true, 
        skuTier == "PremiumV4", true,
        skuTier == "Isolated", true,
        skuTier == "IsolatedV2", true,
        false
    ),
    requiresUpgrade = case(
        skuTier in ("Free", "Shared", "Basic", "Standard") or (skuTier == "Premium" and not(skuName contains "v")), true,
        false
    )
| extend
    recommendedSku = case(
        // If already supports zone redundancy, keep same SKU
        supportsZoneRedundancy, skuName,
        // Otherwise map to v4 equivalent
        skuTier in ("Free", "Shared") or skuName in ("F1", "D1"), "P0v4",
        skuTier == "Basic" or skuName startswith "B", "P0v4", 
        skuTier == "Standard" or skuName startswith "S", "P0v4",
        skuName == "P1" or skuName == "P1v2", "P1v4",
        skuName == "P2" or skuName == "P2v2", "P2v4", 
        skuName == "P3" or skuName == "P3v2", "P3v4",
        skuName == "P1v3", "P1v4",
        skuName == "P1mv3", "P1mv4", 
        skuName == "P2v3", "P2v4",
        skuName == "P2mv3", "P2mv4",
        skuName == "P3v3", "P3v4",
        skuName == "P3mv3", "P3mv4",
        skuName == "P4mv3", "P4mv4", 
        skuName == "P5mv3", "P5mv4",
        skuName
    ),
    recommendedCapacity = case(
        currentCapacity < 2, 2,
        currentCapacity
    ),
    requiresInstanceIncrease = case(
        currentCapacity < 2, true,
        false
    )
| extend
    // Current monthly cost calculation
    currentMonthlyCost = case(
        skuTier == "Free" or skuName == "F1", 0.0,
        skuTier == "Shared" or skuName == "D1", 0.0,
        skuName == "B1", todouble({basicB1Price}) * 730.0 * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "B2", todouble({basicB2Price}) * 730.0 * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "B3", todouble({basicB3Price}) * 730.0 * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "S1", todouble({standardS1Price}) * 730.0 * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "S2", todouble({standardS2Price}) * 730.0 * todouble(currentCapacity), 
        skuName == "S3", todouble({standardS3Price}) * 730.0 * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "P1", todouble({premiumP1Price}) * 730.0 * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "P2", todouble({premiumP2Price}) * 730.0 * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "P3", todouble({premiumP3Price}) * 730.0 * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "P0v4", todouble({p0v4Price}) * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "P1v4", todouble({p1v4Price}) * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "P1mv4", todouble({p1mv4Price}) * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "P2v4", todouble({p2v4Price}) * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "P2mv4", todouble({p2mv4Price}) * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "P3v4", todouble({p3v4Price}) * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "P3mv4", todouble({p3mv4Price}) * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "P4mv4", todouble({p4mv4Price}) * todouble(currentCapacity),
        skuName == "P5mv4", todouble({p5mv4Price}) * todouble(currentCapacity),
        0.0
    )
| extend
    // Target monthly cost calculation
    targetMonthlyCost = case(
        recommendedSku == "P0v4", todouble({p0v4Price}) * todouble(recommendedCapacity),
        recommendedSku == "P1v4", todouble({p1v4Price}) * todouble(recommendedCapacity),
        recommendedSku == "P1mv4", todouble({p1mv4Price}) * todouble(recommendedCapacity),
        recommendedSku == "P2v4", todouble({p2v4Price}) * todouble(recommendedCapacity),
        recommendedSku == "P2mv4", todouble({p2mv4Price}) * todouble(recommendedCapacity),
        recommendedSku == "P3v4", todouble({p3v4Price}) * todouble(recommendedCapacity),
        recommendedSku == "P3mv4", todouble({p3mv4Price}) * todouble(recommendedCapacity),
        recommendedSku == "P4mv4", todouble({p4mv4Price}) * todouble(recommendedCapacity),
        recommendedSku == "P5mv4", todouble({p5mv4Price}) * todouble(recommendedCapacity),
        currentMonthlyCost
    )
| extend 
    additionalMonthlyCost = targetMonthlyCost - currentMonthlyCost
| extend
    Recommendation = case(
        requiresUpgrade, strcat("Upgrade to ", recommendedSku, " and enable zone redundancy"),
        requiresInstanceIncrease, strcat("Enable zone redundancy (minimum 2 instances required)"),
        "Enable zone redundancy on current plan"
    ),
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        requiresUpgrade, "High",
        requiresInstanceIncrease, "Medium", 
        "Medium"
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        requiresUpgrade, "High",
        "Medium"
    ),
    CostImpact = case(
        additionalMonthlyCost > 100.0, "High",
        additionalMonthlyCost > 0.0, "Medium",
        "None"
    )
| project 

    name,
    skuName,
    skuTier,
    currentCapacity,
    recommendedSku,
    recommendedCapacity,
    requiresUpgrade,
    requiresInstanceIncrease,
    targetMonthlyCost,
    additionalMonthlyCost,
    resourceGroup,
    Recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity, 
    CostImpact,
    location,
    subscriptionId","size":0,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"true","representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"failed","text":"{0}{1}"}]}}]}},"name":"queryAppService"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforAppService","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupAppService"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedDetailsTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"app"},"name":"group - Details-App"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Azure Container Services Availability Zone Coverage","items":[{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"parameters":[{"id":"a46fa23b-8d13-496d-be3d-6c0228e4c5d7","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"CheckforACR","type":1,"query":"// Count query for Container Registries needing zone redundancy
resources

)
    on id

| extend HasNonZonalContainerRegistry = iff(ContainerRegistryCount > 0, "Yes", "No")

resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets'
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend isAKSManaged = case(
    tags has "aks-managed-orchestrator" or name startswith "aks-", true,
    false
)
| where isAKSManaged == true  // Only AKS-managed VMSS
| extend currentZoneRedundant = case(
    isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) <= 1, false,
    true
)
//| where currentZoneRedundant == false  // Only non-zone-redundant VMSS
| join kind = innerunique (
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}'])
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | distinct id
) on id
| summarize AKSVMSSCount = count()
| extend HasNonZonalAKSVMSS = iff(AKSVMSSCount > 0, "Yes", "No")
| project HasNonZonalAKSVMSS","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","id":"d13b21b0-23e8-4e22-8803-fb18118edda3"}],"style":"pills","queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"AlwaysHidden","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"true"},"name":"paramCheckResourceIntegrationService"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Azure Container Service (AKS) [🟢No additional cost.]","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets'
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId)
| extend isAKSManaged = case(
    tags has "aks-managed-orchestrator" or name startswith "aks-", true,
    false
)
| where isAKSManaged == true  // Only AKS-managed VMSS
| extend currentZoneRedundant = case(
    isnull(zones) or array_length(zones) <= 1, false,
    true
)
| where currentZoneRedundant == false  // Only non-zone-redundant VMSS
| extend skuName = tostring(sku.name)
| extend currentCapacity = toint(sku.capacity)
| extend vmssResourceGroup = resourceGroup
// Join with parent AKS cluster information
| join kind=leftouter (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters'
    | extend nodeResourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', tostring(properties.nodeResourceGroup))
    | extend clusterName = name
    | extend clusterLocation = location
    | project aksClusterId = id, clusterName, clusterLocation, nodeResourceGroup
) on $left.vmssResourceGroup == $right.nodeResourceGroup
| extend 
    Recommendation = strcat("Configure '", coalesce(clusterName, "Standalone"), "' node pools across multiple availability zones"),
    CostImpact = "🟡 Minimal network cost increase only - no compute cost change",
    ImplementationImpact = "Low",
    ImplementationComplexity = "Medium"  // Requires node pool recreation
// Tag filtering
| join kind = innerunique (
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}'])
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | distinct id
) on id
// Final deduplication by VMSS ID
| summarize 
    take_any(name, clusterName, location, skuName, currentCapacity, zones, Recommendation, CostImpact, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity, vmssResourceGroup, subscriptionId) 
    by id
| project 
    VMSSName = name,
    AKSCluster = coalesce(clusterName, "Standalone VMSS"),
    Location = location,
    SKU = skuName,
    CurrentCapacity = currentCapacity,
    CurrentZones = zones,
    Recommendation,
    //CostImpact,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    ResourceGroup = split(vmssResourceGroup, '/')[4],
    SubscriptionId = split(subscriptionId, '/')[2]
| sort by VMSSName asc","size":0,"noDataMessage":"All Azure Container Services (AKS) have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"0","representation":"4","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"success","text":""}]}}]}},"name":"query-containerService-zones-details"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforAKS","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupAKS"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Azure Container Apps environments🔴 [No Cost Est.]","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"Note: Cost based on East US rates (Sep 2025). )
    on id
| project

    resourceGroup,
    Recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    location,
    subscriptionId

## BCDR Best Practice Checks
This section reviews your Azure resources for alignment with BCDR best practices. Recommendations focus on ensuring that your workloads are resilient to outages, have appropriate backup and recovery strategies, and are configured for high availability. Addressing these findings helps minimize downtime and data loss in the event of failures or disasters.","style":"upsell"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"SelectedSubTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Overview"},"name":"text - BCDR"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// VM Backup Recommendation
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
    and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| project vmId = tolower(id), vmName = name, subscriptionId, resourceGroup, location, type
| join kind=leftouter (
    recoveryservicesresources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults/backupfabrics/protectioncontainers/protecteditems'
    | where properties.protectedItemType =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
    | extend sourceResourceId = tolower(tostring(properties.sourceResourceId))
    | where isnotempty(sourceResourceId)
    | distinct sourceResourceId
) on $left.vmId == $right.sourceResourceId
| extend hasBackup = iff(isempty(sourceResourceId), false, true)
| extend
    Recommendation = iff(hasBackup, "VM has backup configured", "Enable VM Backup"),
    RecommendationId = iff(hasBackup, "backup-vm-001-protected", "backup-vm-001-unprotected"),
    ImplementationImpact = "High",
    ImplementationComplexity = "Low",
    type = "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| where hasBackup == false
| join kind=leftouter (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
       and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
    | summarize Total = count()
    | extend type = "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
) on type
| summarize ImpactedCount = count() by RecommendationId, type, Recommendation, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity, Total
| extend ImpactedResources = strcat(ImpactedCount, '/', Total)
| project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity

// Recovery Services Vault Recommendations
| union (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults'
    | extend bcdrSecurityLevel = tostring(properties.bcdrSecurityLevel)
    | where bcdrSecurityLevel =~ "Poor"
    | summarize ImpactedCount = count(), Total = count() by type, bcdrSecurityLevel
    | extend
        Recommendation = "BCDR Security Level is poor",
        RecommendationId = "5388f93e-bde1-49e7-a166-6c24e90b2daf",
        ImplementationImpact = "High",
        ImplementationComplexity = "Medium",
        ImpactedResources = strcat(ImpactedCount, '/', Total)
    | project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity
)
| union (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults'
    | extend standardTierStorageRedundancy = tostring(properties.redundancySettings.standardTierStorageRedundancy)
    | where standardTierStorageRedundancy =~ "ZoneRedundant"
    | summarize ImpactedCount = count(), Total = count() by type, standardTierStorageRedundancy
    | extend
        Recommendation = "Standard Tier Storage Redundancy is ZoneRedundant",
        RecommendationId = "d20ca2a6-1aea-40ea-93cb-bc31fa5a1eda",
        ImplementationImpact = "High",
        ImplementationComplexity = "Low",
        ImpactedResources = strcat(ImpactedCount, '/', Total)
    | project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity
)
| union (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults'
    | extend crossRegionRestore = tostring(properties.redundancySettings.crossRegionRestore)
    | where crossRegionRestore =~ "Disabled"
    | summarize ImpactedCount = count(), Total = count() by type, crossRegionRestore
    | extend
        Recommendation = "Cross Region Restore is disabled",
        RecommendationId = "44296813-ef2e-4a0b-8c87-01c9e84858d4",
        ImplementationImpact = "High",
        ImplementationComplexity = "Low",
        ImpactedResources = strcat(ImpactedCount, '/', Total)
    | project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity
)
| union (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults'
    | extend softDeleteState = tostring(properties.securitySettings.softDeleteSettings.softDeleteState)
    | where softDeleteState =~ "Disabled"
    | summarize ImpactedCount = count(), Total = count() by type, softDeleteState
    | extend
        Recommendation = "Soft Delete is disabled",
        RecommendationId = "578a900c-b349-4dfa-9049-3af5d2961764",
        ImplementationImpact = "High",
        ImplementationComplexity = "Low",
        ImpactedResources = strcat(ImpactedCount, '/', Total)
    | project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity
)","size":0,"title":"Recommendation by Impact","queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"visualization":"tiles","sortBy":[],"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"Recommendation"},"subtitleContent":{"columnMatch":"type"},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"ImpactedResources","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"auto"},"tooltipFormat":{"tooltip":"Number of impacted resources / Total resources"}},"secondaryContent":{"columnMatch":"RecommendationId"},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto","styleSettings":{"borderStyle":"rounded"}}},"name":"visualImplementationImpact-BCDR"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// VM Backup Recommendation
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
    and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| project vmId = tolower(id), vmName = name, subscriptionId, resourceGroup, location, type
| join kind=leftouter (
    recoveryservicesresources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults/backupfabrics/protectioncontainers/protecteditems'
    | where properties.protectedItemType =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
    | extend sourceResourceId = tolower(tostring(properties.sourceResourceId))
    | where isnotempty(sourceResourceId)
    | distinct sourceResourceId
) on $left.vmId == $right.sourceResourceId
| extend hasBackup = iff(isempty(sourceResourceId), false, true)
| extend
    Recommendation = iff(hasBackup, "VM has backup configured", "Enable VM Backup"),
    RecommendationId = iff(hasBackup, "backup-vm-001-protected", "backup-vm-001-unprotected"),
    ImplementationImpact = "High",
    ImplementationComplexity = "Low",
    type = "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| where hasBackup == false
| join kind=leftouter (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
       and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
    | summarize Total = count()
    | extend type = "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
) on type
| summarize ImpactedCount = count() by RecommendationId, type, Recommendation, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity, Total
| extend ImpactedResources = strcat(ImpactedCount, '/', Total)
| project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity

// Recovery Services Vault Recommendations
| union (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults'
    | extend bcdrSecurityLevel = tostring(properties.bcdrSecurityLevel)
    | where bcdrSecurityLevel =~ "Poor"
    | summarize ImpactedCount = count(), Total = count() by type, bcdrSecurityLevel
    | extend
        Recommendation = "BCDR Security Level is poor",
        RecommendationId = "5388f93e-bde1-49e7-a166-6c24e90b2daf",
        ImplementationImpact = "High",
        ImplementationComplexity = "Medium",
        ImpactedResources = strcat(ImpactedCount, '/', Total)
    | project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity
)
| union (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults'
    | extend standardTierStorageRedundancy = tostring(properties.redundancySettings.standardTierStorageRedundancy)
    | where standardTierStorageRedundancy =~ "ZoneRedundant"
    | summarize ImpactedCount = count(), Total = count() by type, standardTierStorageRedundancy
    | extend
        Recommendation = "Standard Tier Storage Redundancy is ZoneRedundant",
        RecommendationId = "d20ca2a6-1aea-40ea-93cb-bc31fa5a1eda",
        ImplementationImpact = "High",
        ImplementationComplexity = "Low",
        ImpactedResources = strcat(ImpactedCount, '/', Total)
    | project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity
)
| union (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults'
    | extend crossRegionRestore = tostring(properties.redundancySettings.crossRegionRestore)
    | where crossRegionRestore =~ "Disabled"
    | summarize ImpactedCount = count(), Total = count() by type, crossRegionRestore
    | extend
        Recommendation = "Cross Region Restore is disabled",
        RecommendationId = "44296813-ef2e-4a0b-8c87-01c9e84858d4",
        ImplementationImpact = "High",
        ImplementationComplexity = "Low",
        ImpactedResources = strcat(ImpactedCount, '/', Total)
    | project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity
)
| union (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults'
    | extend softDeleteState = tostring(properties.securitySettings.softDeleteSettings.softDeleteState)
    | where softDeleteState =~ "Disabled"
    | summarize ImpactedCount = count(), Total = count() by type, softDeleteState
    | extend
        Recommendation = "Soft Delete is disabled",
        RecommendationId = "578a900c-b349-4dfa-9049-3af5d2961764",
        ImplementationImpact = "High",
        ImplementationComplexity = "Low",
        ImpactedResources = strcat(ImpactedCount, '/', Total)
    | project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity
)","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Backup recommendations","showRefreshButton":true,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"ImplementationComplexity","sortOrder":1}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"ImplementationComplexity","sortOrder":1}]},"name":"Executive insights-BCDR"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"SelectedSubTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Overview"},"name":"groupOverviewBackup"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"understand-cost-calc-yesno","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"understandCostCalculations","label":"Show backup cost calculation details?","type":2,"isRequired":true,"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[],"showDefault":false},"jsonData":"[
    {
    "value" : "Yes",
    "label" : "Yes"
    },
    {
    "value" : "No",
    "label" : "No",
    "selected" : true
    }
]"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"Show Cost Calculation Details"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### How Backup Cost Is Calculated  

This section estimates the monthly backup cost for each unprotected VM using the following formula:  

- **Total Disk Size (GB):** The size of the VM's managed disk(s).  
- **Data Change Rate:** The estimated daily percentage of data that changes (as a fraction).  
- **Backup Agent Cost:** Fixed monthly cost for the backup agent.  
- **Storage Price per GB/Month:** The cost to store 1 GB of backup data for a month.  
- **Snapshot Retention:** Number of days snapshots are retained.  
- **Snapshot Price:** Cost per GB for snapshot storage.  

#### Calculation Steps  
1. **Monthly Data Churn:**  
   - `storageUsedGb = totalDiskGb + totalDiskGb * (changeRateDaily * 30)`  
   - Accounts for original disk size plus new/changed data over the month.  

2. **Snapshot Storage:**  
   - `SnapshotStorageGb = (totalDiskGb * changeRateDaily) * snapshotRetention`  
   - Estimates additional storage needed for retained snapshots.  

3. **Cost Components:**  
   - `CostperBackup = storageUsedGb * storagePricePerGbMonth`  
   - `CostperSnapshot = SnapshotStorageGb * snapshotPrice`  
   - `EstimatedMonthlyBackupCost = CostperBackup + CostperSnapshot + backupAgentCost`  

#### Assumed Values  
- **Storage Price per GB/Month:** Default is $0.05 (editable)  
- **Daily Data Change Rate:** Default is 10% (editable)  
- **Backup Agent Cost:** Default is $10/month (editable)  
- **Data Retention:** Default is 30 days (editable)  
- **Snapshot Retention:** Default is 3 days (editable)  
- **Snapshot Price:** Default is $0.144/GB (editable)  

You can adjust these parameters above to reflect your environment or pricing model.  
"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"Backup Cost Calculation Explanation"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"b2e4c0f5-4d3b-4f7a-8b9f-222222222222","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"storagePricePerGbMonth","label":"Storage price per GB / month (USD)","type":1,"defaultValue":"0.05","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"0.028"},{"id":"d4e6a217-6f5d-4b9c-abdf-444444444444","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"changeRateDaily","label":"Estimated daily % data change rate (fraction)","type":1,"defaultValue":"0.10","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"1"},{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"backupAgentCost","label":"Backup agent cost","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"defaultValue":"10","value":"10","id":"0e2f4a2a-3e09-4c65-9b90-c551c5fadb91"},{"id":"00376c71-e8d8-48b4-bee3-d99d8d3f5857","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"dailyRetention","label":"Data retentation (days)","type":1,"value":"30"},{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"snapshotRetention","label":"Snapshot retention time","type":1,"value":"3","id":"2ef0a5f3-0e05-414f-a859-7ac9e69cf12f"},{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"snapshotPrice","label":"Snapshot storage price","type":1,"value":"0.144","id":"00f8da7f-e675-4846-bb88-c396faa32581"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"parameters - BackupPricing"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"Note: Cost based on East US rates (Sep 2025). Backup costs include storage, snapshots, and agent fees. Estimates assume default retention policies and change rates. Actual costs vary by backup frequency, retention settings, and data change patterns. For detailed pricing, see [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/).","style":"upsell"},"name":"text - 4"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
    and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| project 
    VMName = name, 
    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup, 
    Location = location, 
    VMId = tolower(id), 
    subscriptionId
// Join with managed disks to get disk size
| join kind=leftouter (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/disks'
    | project DiskId = id, VMId = tolower(managedBy), DiskSizeGB = tostring(properties.diskSizeGB)
) on $left.VMId == $right.VMId
// Join with Recovery Services to check backup status
| join kind=leftouter (
    recoveryservicesresources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults/backupfabrics/protectioncontainers/protecteditems'
    | where properties.protectedItemType =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
    | extend sourceResourceId = tolower(tostring(properties.sourceResourceId))
    | where isnotempty(sourceResourceId)
    | distinct sourceResourceId
) on $left.VMId == $right.sourceResourceId
| extend BackupStatus = iff(isempty(sourceResourceId), "Not Protected", "Protected")
| where BackupStatus == "Not Protected"
// Cost calculation
| extend totalDiskGb       = todouble(DiskSizeGB),
         changeRateMonthly = todouble({changeRateDaily}) / 100.0,   // % of data change per day
         agentCost         = todouble({backupAgentCost})      // fixed backup agent cost
| extend storageUsedGb     = totalDiskGb + totalDiskGb * (changeRateMonthly * 30)  // monthly churn
| extend SnapshotStorageGb = (totalDiskGb * changeRateMonthly) * {snapshotRetention}
| extend CostPerGB         = todouble({storagePricePerGbMonth})
| extend SnapshotCostPerGB = todouble({snapshotPrice})
// Cost components
| extend CostperBackup     = storageUsedGb * CostPerGB
| extend CostperSnapshot   = SnapshotStorageGb * SnapshotCostPerGB
| extend EstimatedMonthlyBackupCost = CostperBackup + CostperSnapshot + agentCost
// Final output
| extend Recommendation           = "Enable VM Backup",
         ImplementationImpact     = "High",
         ImplementationComplexity = "Low"
| project Recommendation, VMName, DiskSizeGB, Location, EstimatedMonthlyBackupCost, ResourceGroup, 
         ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity, subscriptionId
| sort by VMName asc

without Defender for Server protection (no security assessments)
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
    and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| extend vmId = tolower(id)
| join kind=leftouter (
    securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
    | where properties.resourceDetails.ResourceType =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
    | extend vmId = tolower(tostring(properties.resourceDetails.Id))
    | summarize hasAssessments = count() by vmId
) on vmId
| where isempty(hasAssessments)
| extend
    Recommendation = "Enable Defender for Server",
    RecommendationId = "defender-server-001",
    ImplementationImpact = "High",
    ImplementationComplexity = "Low",
    type = "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| project id = vmId, type, Recommendation, RecommendationId, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity
| join kind=leftouter (
    resources
    | where type =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
        and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
    | summarize Total = count()
    | extend type = "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
) on type
| summarize ImpactedCount = count() by RecommendationId, type, Recommendation, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity, Total
| extend ImpactedResources = strcat(ImpactedCount, '/', Total)
| project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity","size":0,"title":"Recommendation by Impact","noDataMessage":"All of your VMs are protected with Defender for Servers","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"visualization":"tiles","sortBy":[],"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"Recommendation"},"subtitleContent":{"columnMatch":"type"},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"ImpactedResources","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"auto"},"tooltipFormat":{"tooltip":"Number of impacted resources / Total resources"}},"secondaryContent":{"columnMatch":"RecommendationId"},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto","styleSettings":{"borderStyle":"rounded"}}},"name":"visualImplementationImpact-Defender"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// Query to show VMs without Defender for Server protection (no security assessments)
// Get total VM count first
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
    and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| summarize TotalVMs = count()
| extend type = "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| join kind=leftouter (
    // Get unprotected VMs (no security assessments)
    resources
    | where type =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
        and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
    | extend vmId = tolower(id)
    | join kind=leftouter (
        securityresources
        | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
        | where properties.resourceDetails.ResourceType =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
        | extend vmId = tolower(tostring(properties.resourceDetails.Id))
        | summarize hasAssessments = count() by vmId
    ) on vmId
    | where isempty(hasAssessments)
    | summarize UnprotectedCount = count()
    | extend type = "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
) on type
| extend 
    ImpactedCount = coalesce(toint(UnprotectedCount), 0),
    Recommendation = iff(coalesce(toint(UnprotectedCount), 0) == 0, 
        strcat("✓ All ", TotalVMs, " VMs in scope are protected"),
        "Enable Defender for Server"),
    RecommendationId = "defender-server-001",
    ImplementationImpact = iff(coalesce(toint(UnprotectedCount), 0) == 0, "N/A", "High"),
    ImplementationComplexity = iff(coalesce(toint(UnprotectedCount), 0) == 0, "N/A", "Low"),
    ImpactedResources = iff(coalesce(toint(UnprotectedCount), 0) == 0,
        strcat("0/", TotalVMs, " (All Protected)"),
        strcat(coalesce(toint(UnprotectedCount), 0), '/', TotalVMs))
| project Recommendation, type, ImpactedResources, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Defender for Cloud recommendations","showRefreshButton":true,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"ImplementationComplexity","sortOrder":1}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"ImplementationComplexity","sortOrder":1}]},"name":"Executive insights-Defender"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"SelectedSubTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Overview"},"name":"groupOverviewDefender"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"> **Note:** Cost estimation is based on Defender for Cloud Server Plan 2, using pay-as-you-go pricing for East US as of September 2025.","style":"upsell"},"name":"text - 2"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"understand-cost-calc-yesno","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"understandCostCalculations","label":"Show Defender cost calculation details?","type":2,"isRequired":true,"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[],"showDefault":false},"jsonData":"[

resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| extend vmId = tolower(id)
| join kind=leftouter (
    securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
    | where properties.resourceDetails.ResourceType =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
    | extend vmId = tolower(tostring(properties.resourceDetails.Id))
    | summarize hasAssessments = count() by vmId
) on vmId
| where isempty(hasAssessments)
| project 
    vmName = name,
    resourceGroup,
    location,
    subscriptionId,
    protectionStatus = "Not Protected"
| order by vmName asc
// Cost calculation
| extend AgentCost       = todouble({defenderforServeragent})
| project vmName, subscriptionId, resourceGroup, location, AgentCost

| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})

| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})

| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))

    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}'])
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | project id
    )
    on id
| extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = 0.0  // No additional cost for zone redundancy
| extend 
    Recommendation = case(
        zoneRedundant, 'No action needed - Zone redundancy configured (99.99% SLA)',
        zoneCount == 1, 'Redeploy firewall with multi-zone configuration for 99.99% SLA',
        zoneCount == 0 or isnull(zones), 'Redeploy firewall with zone redundancy for 99.99% SLA',
        'Review firewall zone configuration'
    ),
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        zoneRedundant, 'None',
        'High'  // All non-redundant cases require redeployment
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        zoneRedundant, 'None',
        'High'  // All non-redundant cases require full redeployment
    ),
    CostEstimation = '🟢 [Cost Est.] No additional cost - Redeployment required'

    ZoneCount=zoneCount,
    ZoneConfigured=zoneRedundant,
    AvailabilityZones=zonesConfigured,
    ResourceGroup=resourceGroup,
    CurrentSLA=iff(zoneRedundant, '99.99%', '99.95%'),
    Recommendation,
        ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    EstimatedMonthlyCost,
    SubscriptionId=subscriptionId,
    Location=location

For detailed pricing, see [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/).","style":"info"},"name":"text - 3"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforFirewall","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupAzureFW"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"understand-cost-calc-yesno","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"understandCostCalculations","label":"Show App GW cost calculation details?","type":2,"defaultValue":"No","values":[{"label":"Yes","value":"Yes"},{"label":"No","value":"No"}]}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"Show Cost Calculation Details"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"a1a1ed79-dd3e-4c78-bde6-2427b0606874","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"AppGWperhour","label":"App Gateway per hour","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"0.20"},{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"CapacityUnitperhour","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"label":"Capacity unit per hour","id":"6c68dc7d-6b7e-4629-8595-978cf44a14fb","value":"0.008"},{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"OutboundDataTransferGb","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"101","id":"865b9bac-a29a-49ab-816f-bcfbcc03456c"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"param-AppGWPrice"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### How Application Gateway Cost is Calculated

**Monthly Cost Formula:**
- **Gateway Hours:** Application Gateway cost per hour × 730 hours
- **Capacity Units:** Capacity Unit cost per hour × 730 hours  
- **Data Transfer:** Tiered pricing based on monthly outbound data transfer

**Data Transfer Pricing Tiers:**
- First 100 GB: Free
- Next 10 TB: $0.04 per GB
- Next 40 TB: $0.08 per GB
- Next 100 TB: $0.04 per GB
- Next 350 TB: $0.065 per GB

**Default Assumptions:**
- Application Gateway: $0.125/hour
- Capacity Unit: $0.008/hour
- Outbound Data Transfer: 1,000 GB/month
- Pricing based on North America/Europe regions (September 2025)

You can adjust these parameters above to match your specific usage patterns and get a more accurate cost estimate.","style":"info"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"UdnerstandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"text-appgwcosts"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ "microsoft.network/applicationGateways"
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend locations = properties.locations
| extend zoneRedundant = iif(array_length(zones) >= 2, "true", "false")
| where zoneRedundant == "false"
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    )
    on id
// Cost calculation for outbound data transfer with tiered pricing
| extend outboundDataGB = todouble({OutboundDataTransferGb})
| extend dataTransferCost = case(
    outboundDataGB <= 100, 0.0,  // First 100 GB free
    outboundDataGB <= 10340, (outboundDataGB - 100) * 0.04,  // Next 10 TB at $0.04/GB
    outboundDataGB <= 51440, ((10340 - 100) * 0.04) + ((outboundDataGB - 10340) * 0.08),  // Next 40 TB at $0.08/GB
    outboundDataGB <= 153840, ((10340 - 100) * 0.04) + ((51440 - 10340) * 0.08) + ((outboundDataGB - 51440) * 0.04),  // Next 100 TB at $0.04/GB
    ((10340 - 100) * 0.04) + ((51440 - 10340) * 0.08) + ((153840 - 51440) * 0.04) + ((outboundDataGB - 153840) * 0.065)  // Next 350 TB at $0.065/GB
)
// Total cost calculation
| extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = (todouble({AppGWperhour}) * 730) + (todouble({CapacityUnitperhour}) * 730) + dataTransferCost
| extend 
    Recommendation = "Enable Application Gateway Zone Redundancy",
    ImplementationImpact = "High",
    ImplementationComplexity = "Medium"
| project Recommendation, name, location, EstimatedMonthlyCost, dataTransferCost, resourceGroup, 
         ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity, subscriptionId, zoneRedundant

**Monthly Cost Formula:**
- **Base Gateway Cost:** Fixed monthly cost based on AZ SKU tier
- **Additional S2S Tunnels:** $0.015/hour for tunnels beyond included limit
- **Additional P2S Connections:** $0.01/hour for connections beyond 128

**SKU Mapping & Base Costs:**
- Basic/Standard → VpnGw1AZ: $153.30/month
- VpnGw1 → VpnGw1AZ: $153.30/month  
- VpnGw2 → VpnGw2AZ: $394.20/month
- VpnGw3 → VpnGw3AZ: $1,007.40/month
- VpnGw4 → VpnGw4AZ: $1,686.30/month
- VpnGw5 → VpnGw5AZ: $2,934.60/month

**Included Limits:**
- **S2S Tunnels:** First 10 included (VpnGw1-3AZ), first 10 included (VpnGw4-5AZ supports up to 100)
- **P2S Connections:** First 128 included for all SKUs

**Calculation Example:**
- VpnGw2AZ base cost: $394.20/month
- 5 S2S tunnels: Free (within 10 limit)
- 50 P2S connections: Free (within 128 limit)  
- Total monthly cost: $394.20

**Default Assumptions:**
- S2S Tunnels: 5 tunnels
- P2S Connections: 50 connections
- East US pricing (September 2025)

You can adjust these parameters above to match your specific gateway configuration.","style":"info"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"text - 2"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ "microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways"
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend skuName = tostring(properties.sku.name)
| extend skuTier = tostring(properties.sku.tier)
| extend skuCapacity = toint(properties.sku.capacity)
| extend gatewayType = tostring(properties.gatewayType)
| extend locations = properties.locations
| extend zoneRedundant = iif(skuName contains 'AZ' or skuTier contains 'AZ', "true", "false")
| where zoneRedundant == "false"
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | distinct id
    )
    on id
// Map current SKU to equivalent AZ SKU and calculate costs
| extend equivalentAZSku = case(
    skuName =~ "VpnGw1" or skuTier =~ "VpnGw1", "VpnGw1AZ",
    skuName =~ "VpnGw2" or skuTier =~ "VpnGw2", "VpnGw2AZ", 
    skuName =~ "VpnGw3" or skuTier =~ "VpnGw3", "VpnGw3AZ",
    skuName =~ "VpnGw4" or skuTier =~ "VpnGw4", "VpnGw4AZ",
    skuName =~ "VpnGw5" or skuTier =~ "VpnGw5", "VpnGw5AZ",
    skuName =~ "Standard" or skuTier =~ "Standard", "VpnGw1AZ",  // Map Standard to VpnGw1AZ
    skuName =~ "Basic" or skuTier =~ "Basic", "VpnGw1AZ",      // Map Basic to VpnGw1AZ
    "VpnGw1AZ"  // Default fallback
)
// Base gateway monthly costs
| extend baseGatewayCost = case(
    equivalentAZSku =~ "VpnGw1AZ", 153.30,
    equivalentAZSku =~ "VpnGw2AZ", 394.20,
    equivalentAZSku =~ "VpnGw3AZ", 1007.40,
    equivalentAZSku =~ "VpnGw4AZ", 1686.30,
    equivalentAZSku =~ "VpnGw5AZ", 2934.60,
    153.30  // Default to VpnGw1AZ cost
)
// Calculate additional tunnel costs (S2S)
| extend s2sTunnels = todouble({s2stunnels})
| extend s2sTunnelCost = case(
    s2sTunnels <= 10, 0.0,  // First 10 included
    equivalentAZSku in~ ("VpnGw1AZ", "VpnGw2AZ", "VpnGw3AZ") and s2sTunnels <= 30, (s2sTunnels - 10) * 0.015 * 730,  // 11-30 tunnels
    equivalentAZSku in~ ("VpnGw4AZ", "VpnGw5AZ") and s2sTunnels <= 100, (s2sTunnels - 10) * 0.015 * 730,  // 11-100 tunnels
    0.0  // Over limit or other cases
)
// Calculate additional connection costs (P2S)
| extend p2sConnections = todouble({P2SConnections})
| extend p2sConnectionCost = case(
    p2sConnections <= 128, 0.0,  // First 128 included
    (p2sConnections - 128) * 0.01 * 730  // Additional connections at $0.01/hour
)
// Total estimated monthly cost
| extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = baseGatewayCost + s2sTunnelCost + p2sConnectionCost
| extend 
    Recommendation = strcat("Upgrade to ", equivalentAZSku, " for Zone Redundancy"),
    ImplementationImpact = "High",
    ImplementationComplexity = "High"
| project name,  resourceGroup,skuName, zoneRedundant,Recommendation, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity, equivalentAZSku, location, 
         EstimatedMonthlyCost, baseGatewayCost, s2sTunnelCost, p2sConnectionCost,
         subscriptionId 
| sort by name asc","size":0,"title":"Azure Virtual Network Gateways","noDataMessage":"All Azure Virtual Network Gateways have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"false","representation":"failed","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"}]}}],"rowLimit":1000,"filter":true,"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"skuName","label":"Current SKU"}]}},"name":"query-virtual-network-gateway-zones"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Cost Estimate:** Monthly VPN Gateway upgrade cost to equivalent AZ SKU based on East US rates, September 2025. Assumes 5 S2S tunnels, 50 P2S connections. For precise costs, see the [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/).","style":"info"},"name":"text - 3"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforVPNGW","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groups2svpn"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ "microsoft.network/bastionhosts"
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend locations=properties.locations
| extend skuName = tostring(sku.name)
| extend skuTier = tostring(sku.tier)
| extend zonesConfigured = tostring(zones)
| extend zoneCount = array_length(zones)
| extend zoneRedundant = iff(zoneCount >= 2, true, false)  // Must have 2+ zones for redundancy
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}'])
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | project id
    )
    on id
| extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = 0.0  // No additional cost for zone redundancy
| extend 
    Recommendation = case(
        zoneRedundant, 'No action needed - Zone redundancy configured',
        zoneCount == 1, 'Redeploy bastion with multi-zone configuration for better resiliency',
        zoneCount == 0 or isnull(zones), 'Redeploy bastion with zone redundancy for improved resiliency',
        'Review bastion zone configuration'
    ),
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        zoneRedundant, 'None',
        'High'  // All non-redundant cases require redeployment
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        zoneRedundant, 'None',
        'Medium'  // All non-redundant cases require full redeployment
    ),
    CostEstimation = '🟢 [Cost Est.] No additional cost - Redeployment required'
| project 

    Resource=name,
    SKU=skuName,
    ZoneConfigured=zoneRedundant,
    ZoneType=case(
        zoneRedundant, 'Zone-redundant',
        zoneCount == 1, 'Zonal (single zone)',
        'No zones configured'
    ),
        ResourceGroup=resourceGroup,
    Recommendation,
        ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    CostEstimation,
    SubscriptionId=subscriptionId,
    Location=location
| order by Resource asc","size":0,"title":"Azure Bastion Hosts 🟢 [Cost Est.] No additional cost","noDataMessage":"All Azure Bastion Hosts have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"false","representation":"failed","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"}]}}],"rowLimit":1000}},"name":"query-bastion-zone-details"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Note:** Cost based on East US rates (Sep 2025). For detailed pricing, see [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/).","style":"info"},"name":"FooterBastion"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforBastion","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupBastion"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"understand-cost-calc-yesno","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"understandCostCalculations","label":"Show Load Balancer cost calculation details?","type":2,"isRequired":true,"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[],"showDefault":false},"jsonData":"[
    {
    "value" : "Yes",
    "label" : "Yes"
    },
    {
    "value" : "No",
    "label" : "No",
    "selected" : true
    }
]"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"Show Cost Calculation Details"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"a1a1ed79-dd3e-4c78-bde6-2427b0606874","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"NetworkRules","label":"Number of rules configured","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"1"},{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"DataProcessedGb","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"1000","label":"Amount of data processed in GB","id":"1816b0b4-55eb-4c0e-a855-143ad394a343"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"param-LBPrice"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### How Load Balancer Cost is Calculated

**Monthly Cost Formula:**
- **Network Rules:** Tiered pricing based on number of rules
- **Data Processing:** $0.005 per GB of processed data

**Network Rules Pricing Tiers:**
- First 5 rules: $0.025/hour each
- Additional rules: $0.01/hour each
- Inbound NAT rules: Free

**Calculation Example:**
- 8 rules = (5 × $0.025 × 730) + (3 × $0.01 × 730) = $91.25 + $21.90 = $113.15/month
- 1,000 GB data processing = 1,000 × $0.005 = $5.00/month
- Total monthly cost = $113.15 + $5.00 = $118.15

**Default Assumptions:**
- Network Rules: 5 rules
- Data Processed: 1,000 GB/month
- Regional Tier pricing (East US, September 2025)

You can adjust these parameters above to match your specific load balancer configuration and get a more accurate cost estimate.","style":"info"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"text - 3"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ "microsoft.network/loadbalancers" and tolower(sku.name) != 'basic'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend locations = properties.locations
| extend zones = zones
| extend zoneRedundant = iif(array_length(zones) >= 2, "true", "false")
| where zoneRedundant == "false"
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | distinct id  // Add this line to deduplicate before join
    )
    on id
// Cost calculation for Load Balancer rules with tiered pricing
| extend networkRules = todouble({NetworkRules})
| extend dataProcessedGB = todouble({DataProcessedGb})
| extend rulesCost = case(
    networkRules <= 5, networkRules * 0.025 * 730,  // First 5 rules at $0.025/hour
    (5 * 0.025 * 730) + ((networkRules - 5) * 0.01 * 730)  // First 5 + additional at $0.01/hour
)
| extend dataProcessingCost = dataProcessedGB * 0.005  // $0.005 per GB
| extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = rulesCost + dataProcessingCost
| extend 
    Recommendation = "Enable Load Balancer Zone Redundancy",
    ImplementationImpact = "High",
    ImplementationComplexity = "Medium"
| project Recommendation, name, location, zoneRedundant, EstimatedMonthlyCost, rulesCost, dataProcessingCost, 
         resourceGroup, ImplementationImpact, ImplementationComplexity, subscriptionId

**Note:** Cost estimates for SQL Database tier upgrades are not included in this analysis due to the complexity and variability of pricing factors:

• **Variable Pricing Models**: SQL Database pricing varies significantly between DTU and vCore models, with different rates for compute, storage, and backup resources
• **Regional Price Differences**: Costs vary substantially across Azure regions and may change based on your specific location
• **Custom Configurations**: Actual costs depend on storage size, backup retention policies, read replicas, and other configuration options
• **Promotional Pricing**: Microsoft frequently offers reserved instance discounts, hybrid benefits, and other cost optimization programs that affect final pricing
• **Dynamic Scaling**: Many deployments use auto-scaling features that make cost prediction highly variable

**For Accurate Cost Estimates:**

Use the [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/) to estimate upgrade costs based on your specific requirements:

1. Select **Databases** → **Azure SQL Database**
2. Configure your current database specifications
3. Compare with the recommended zone-redundant tier
4. Factor in your region, storage needs, and backup requirements

**Alternative:** Consider using [Azure Cost Management](https://portal.azure.com/#view/Microsoft_Azure_CostManagement) to analyze your current SQL Database spending patterns and project upgrade costs based on historical usage."},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"Alwayshidden","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"true"},"name":"text-sql-cost-disclaimer"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.sql/servers/databases'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| where name != 'master'  // Exclude system databases
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend zoneRedundant = tobool(properties.zoneRedundant)
| where not(zoneRedundant)  // Only non-zone-redundant databases
| extend 
    skuName = tostring(sku.name),
    skuTier = tostring(sku.tier),
    skuCapacity = toint(sku.capacity),
    currentServiceObjective = tostring(properties.currentServiceObjectiveName)
| extend 
    purchaseModel = case(
        skuTier in~ ('Basic', 'Standard', 'Premium'), 'DTU',
        skuTier in~ ('GeneralPurpose', 'BusinessCritical', 'Hyperscale'), 'vCore',
        'Unknown'
    )
| extend 
    currentlySupportsZones = case(
        // Based on official documentation
        skuTier =~ 'Basic', false,
        skuTier =~ 'Standard', false,  
        skuTier =~ 'Premium', true,
        skuTier =~ 'GeneralPurpose', true,
        skuTier =~ 'BusinessCritical', true,
        skuTier =~ 'Hyperscale', true,
        false
    )
| extend 
    recommendedAction = case(
        currentlySupportsZones, 'Enable zone redundancy on current tier',
        skuTier =~ 'Basic', 'Upgrade to Premium P1 (DTU) or GP_Gen5_2 (vCore) for zone redundancy',
        skuTier =~ 'Standard', 'Upgrade to Premium P1 (DTU) or GP_Gen5_2 (vCore) for zone redundancy',
        'Enable zone redundancy'  // For tiers that already support it
    ),
    minimumUpgradeTarget = case(
        currentlySupportsZones, 'Current tier with zone redundancy enabled',
        skuTier =~ 'Basic', 'Premium P1 (DTU) or General Purpose 2 vCore',
        skuTier =~ 'Standard', 'Premium P1 (DTU) or General Purpose 2 vCore', 
        'Current tier with zone redundancy'
    )
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    )
    on id
| extend 
    Recommendation = recommendedAction,
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        currentlySupportsZones, 'Medium',  // Just enabling zone redundancy
        'High'  // Requires tier upgrade
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        currentlySupportsZones, 'Low',   // Simple configuration change
        'Medium'  // Requires tier change and potential downtime
    )
| extend estimatedCost="NaN"
| project 
    DatabaseName = name, 
    Recommendation, 
    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup, 
    ImplementationImpact, 
    ImplementationComplexity, 
    Location = location, 
    CurrentTier = skuTier,
    CurrentSKU = skuName,
    SKUCapacity = skuCapacity,
    PurchaseModel = purchaseModel,
    MinimumUpgradeTarget = minimumUpgradeTarget,
    estimatedCost,    
    SubscriptionId = subscriptionId  
| sort by DatabaseName asc","size":0,"title":"Azure SQL Server [🔴No Cost Est.]","noDataMessage":"All Azure SQL Servers have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"failed","text":"{0}{1}"}]}}]}},"name":"query-az-sql-zones-details"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Note:** Cost estimates for SQL Database tier upgrades are not provided due to variable pricing models and regional differences. Use the [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/) for accurate cost projections based on your specific configuration and location.","style":"warning"},"name":"text-sql-cost-disclaimer"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforSQLServer","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupSQLServer"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend locations=properties.locations
| mv-expand cosmosLocation = locations
| extend zones=cosmosLocation.isZoneRedundant
| extend zoneRedundant = case(
    not(zones), false, true 
  )
| where zoneRedundant == false  // Only non-zone-redundant accounts
| extend 
    multiRegionWrites = tobool(properties.enableMultipleWriteLocations),
    regionCount = array_length(properties.locations),
    consistencyLevel = tostring(properties.consistencyPolicy.defaultConsistencyLevel),
    // Extract SKU information
    skuName = tostring(sku.name),
    skuTier = tostring(sku.tier),
    // Extract capabilities first
    capabilities = tostring(properties.capabilities),
    // Extract backup policy for additional context
    backupPolicy = tostring(properties.backupPolicy.type)
| extend 
    // Now use capabilities variable to detect modes
    isServerless = capabilities contains "EnableServerless",
    hasAutoscale = capabilities contains "EnableAutoscale" or capabilities contains "autoscale"
| extend 
    capacityMode = case(
        isServerless, "Serverless",
        hasAutoscale, "Provisioned (Autoscale)",
        "Provisioned (Manual)"
    ),
    accountType = case(
        multiRegionWrites and regionCount > 1, "Multi-region write",
        regionCount > 1, "Multi-region read",
        "Single-region"
    )
| extend 
    costImpact = case(
        multiRegionWrites, "No additional cost - Multi-region write accounts have no billing impact",
        isServerless, "25% increase in request units (RU) consumption",
        hasAutoscale, "25% increase in provisioned RU/s - FREE for autoscale resources",
        "25% increase in provisioned RU/s (1.25x multiplier)"
    ),
    costMultiplier = case(
        multiRegionWrites, "1.0x (No impact)",
        isServerless, "1.25x RU",
        hasAutoscale, "1.0x (Free for autoscale)",
        "1.25x RU/s"
    ),
    recommendedAction = case(
        multiRegionWrites, "Enable availability zones (no cost impact)",
        isServerless, "Enable availability zones (25% RU consumption increase)",
        hasAutoscale, "Enable availability zones (FREE - no cost impact for autoscale)",
        "Enable availability zones (25% RU/s increase) - Consider autoscale to avoid cost"
    )
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    )
    on id
| extend 
    Recommendation = recommendedAction,
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        multiRegionWrites or hasAutoscale, 'High',  // No cost impact
        isServerless, 'High',  // 25% RU increase
        'High'  // 25% RU/s increase
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = 'Low'  // Configuration change only
| project 
    CosmosDBAccount = name,
    AccountType = accountType,
    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup,
    CapacityMode = capacityMode,
    Recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    MultiRegionWrites = multiRegionWrites,
    RegionCount = regionCount,
    CostMultiplier = costMultiplier,
    CostImpactDescription = costImpact,
    Location = location,
    SubscriptionId = subscriptionId
| distinct *
| sort by CosmosDBAccount asc","size":0,"title":"Azure Cosmos DB [🟡Cost Impact]","noDataMessage":"All Azure Cosmos DB instances have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"pinnedZone","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}},{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}}],"rowLimit":1000},"sortBy":[]},"name":"query-documentdb-zones-details"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Note:** Cosmos DB availability zone costs: Multi-region write accounts have no additional cost. Use [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/) for precise cost estimates.","style":"info"},"name":"text-cosmos-cost-disclaimer"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"CheckforCosmosDB","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"groupCosmosDB"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.cache/redis'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend 
    skuName = tostring(properties.sku.name),
    skuFamily = tostring(properties.sku.family),
    skuCapacity = toint(properties.sku.capacity),
    redisVersion = tostring(properties.redisVersion)
| extend 
    supportsZoneRedundancy = case(
        skuName in~ ('Basic', 'Standard'), false,
        skuName in~ ('Premium', 'Enterprise', 'EnterpriseFlash'), true,
        false  // Default for unknown SKUs
    )
| extend 
    currentZoneRedundant = case(
        properties.zonalAllocationPolicy != "Automatic" and (array_length(zones) <= 1 or isnull(zones)), false, 
        true 
    )
| extend 
    recommendation = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), strcat("Upgrade to Premium SKU or higher for zone redundancy support (Current: ", skuName, " C", skuCapacity, ")"),
        currentZoneRedundant, "Already zone redundant",
        "Enable zone redundancy on current SKU"
    ),
    minimumUpgradeTarget = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), "Premium P1 (or higher)",
        "Current SKU with zone redundancy enabled"
    )
| where not(currentZoneRedundant)  // Only show non-zone-redundant instances
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    )
    on id
| extend 
    Recommendation = recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), 'High',  // Requires SKU upgrade
        'High'  // Just enable zone redundancy
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), 'Medium',  // SKU upgrade complexity
        'Low'  // Configuration change
    )
| project 
    RedisCacheName = name,
    CurrentSKU = strcat(skuName, " ", skuFamily, skuCapacity),
    RedisVersion = redisVersion,
    SupportsZoneRedundancy = supportsZoneRedundancy,
    MinimumUpgradeTarget = minimumUpgradeTarget,
    CurrentZones = tostring(zones),
    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup,
    Recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    Location = location,
    SubscriptionId = subscriptionId

| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend 
    highAvailabilityMode = tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode),
    skuName = tostring(sku.name),
    skuTier = tostring(sku.tier),
    storageSizeGB = toint(properties.storage.storageSizeGB),
    mysqlVersion = tostring(properties.version)
| extend 
    zoneRedundant = case(
        highAvailabilityMode != "ZoneRedundant", false, true 
    )
| where zoneRedundant == false  // Only non-zone-redundant servers
| extend 
    costImpact = "100% increase (2x current cost) - Requires duplicate compute and storage for secondary replica",
    costMultiplier = "2.0x (Double current cost)",
    recommendedAction = "Enable zone-redundant high availability"
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    )
    on id
| extend 
    Recommendation = recommendedAction,
    ImplementationImpact = 'High',  // 100% cost increase
    ImplementationComplexity = 'High'  // Configuration change
| project 
    MySQLServerName = name,
    CurrentSKU = skuName,
    SKUTier = skuTier,
    StorageSizeGB = storageSizeGB,
    CurrentHAMode = highAvailabilityMode,
    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup,
    Recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact,
    CostMultiplier = costMultiplier,
    CostImpactDescription = costImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,

Use [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/) for precise cost estimates including backup storage.","style":"info"},"name":"text-mysql-cost-disclaimer"}]},"name":"groupMySQL"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend 
    highAvailabilityMode = tostring(properties.highAvailability.mode),
    skuName = tostring(sku.name),
    skuTier = tostring(sku.tier),
    storageSizeGB = toint(properties.storage.storageSizeGB),
    postgresVersion = strcat(tostring(properties.version), ".", tostring(properties.minorVersion))
| extend 
    supportsZoneRedundancy = case(
        skuTier =~ 'Burstable', false,  // Burstable tier doesn't support zone redundancy
        true  // General Purpose and Memory Optimized support it
    )
| extend 
    zoneRedundant = case(
        highAvailabilityMode != "ZoneRedundant", false, true 
    )
| where zoneRedundant == false  // Only non-zone-redundant servers
| extend 
    recommendation = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), strcat("Upgrade from Burstable tier to General Purpose or Memory Optimized for zone redundancy support (Current: ", skuTier, ")"),
        "Enable zone-redundant high availability"
    ),
    minimumUpgradeTarget = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), "General Purpose or Memory Optimized tier",
        "Current tier with zone redundancy enabled"
    )
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}']), WindowsId=id
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    )
    on id
| extend 
    Recommendation = recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), 'High',  // Requires tier upgrade
        'High'  // Zone redundancy has performance/cost impact but unknown amount
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        not(supportsZoneRedundancy), 'Medium',  // Tier upgrade complexity
        'Low'  // Configuration change
    )
| project 
    PostgreSQLServerName = name,
    CurrentSKU = skuName,
    SKUTier = skuTier,
    StorageSizeGB = storageSizeGB,
    SupportsZoneRedundancy = supportsZoneRedundancy,
    ResourceGroup = resourceGroup,
    Recommendation,
    ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    PostgreSQLVersion = postgresVersion,
    CurrentHAMode = highAvailabilityMode,
    MinimumUpgradeTarget = minimumUpgradeTarget,
    Location = location,
    SubscriptionId = subscriptionId
