]"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"Show Cost Calculation Details"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"How VPN Gateway Cost is Calculated
Monthly Cost Formula:

Base Gateway Cost: Fixed monthly cost based on AZ SKU tier
Additional S2S Tunnels: $0.015/hour for tunnels beyond included limit
Additional P2S Connections: $0.01/hour for connections beyond 128
SKU Mapping & Base Costs:

Basic/Standard → VpnGw1AZ: $153.30/month
VpnGw1 → VpnGw1AZ: $153.30/month
VpnGw2 → VpnGw2AZ: $394.20/month
VpnGw3 → VpnGw3AZ: $1,007.40/month
VpnGw4 → VpnGw4AZ: $1,686.30/month
VpnGw5 → VpnGw5AZ: $2,934.60/month
Included Limits:

S2S Tunnels: First 10 included (VpnGw1-3AZ), first 10 included (VpnGw4-5AZ supports up to 100)
P2S Connections: First 128 included for all SKUs
Calculation Example:

VpnGw2AZ base cost: $394.20/month
5 S2S tunnels: Free (within 10 limit)
50 P2S connections: Free (within 128 limit)
Total monthly cost: $394.20
Default Assumptions:

S2S Tunnels: 5 tunnels
P2S Connections: 50 connections
East US pricing (September 2025)
You can adjust these parameters above to match your specific gateway configuration.","style":"info"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"texAPIMCost"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"953d5198-c688-447e-b6b0-b2d7af9a1920","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"baseUnit","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"1"},{"id":"eb56a996-f4b8-4253-af77-60119a5be04a","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"pricePerHour","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"3.84"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"understandCostCalculations","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"paramAPIMCosts"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.apimanagement/service'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend skuName = tostring(sku.name)
| extend skuCapacity = toint(sku.capacity)
| extend zoneRedundant = case(
    skuName =~ 'Premium' and (not(isnull(zones)) and array_length(zones) > 1), true,
    false 
  )
| extend zoneSupported = iff(skuName =~ 'Premium', true, false)
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}'])
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | project id
    )
    on id
| extend 
    baseUnit = toint({baseUnit}),
    pricePerHour = todouble({pricePerHour}),
    hoursPerMonth = 730
| extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = case(
    skuName =~ 'Premium' and zoneRedundant, 0.0, // No additional cost if already Premium with zones
    skuName =~ 'Premium' and not(zoneRedundant), 0.0, // No cost to configure zones on existing Premium
    baseUnit * pricePerHour * hoursPerMonth // Cost to upgrade to Premium tier
)
| extend 
    Recommendation = case(
        skuName =~ 'Premium' and zoneRedundant, 'No action needed - Zone redundancy configured',
        skuName =~ 'Premium' and not(zoneRedundant), 'Configure availability zones for Premium tier',
        skuName in~ ('Developer', 'Basic', 'Standard', 'BasicV2', 'StandardV2', 'PremiumV2', 'Consumption'), 'Upgrade to Premium (classic) tier for zone redundancy support',
        'Review APIM tier for zone redundancy capabilities'
    ),
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        skuName =~ 'Premium' and zoneRedundant, 'None',
        skuName =~ 'Premium' and not(zoneRedundant), 'Low',
        skuName in~ ('Developer', 'Basic', 'Standard'), 'High',
        skuName in~ ('BasicV2', 'StandardV2', 'PremiumV2', 'Consumption'), 'High',
        'Medium'
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        skuName =~ 'Premium' and zoneRedundant, 'None',
        skuName =~ 'Premium' and not(zoneRedundant), 'Low',
        skuName in~ ('Developer', 'Basic', 'Standard'), 'High',
        skuName in~ ('BasicV2', 'StandardV2', 'PremiumV2', 'Consumption'), 'High',
        'Medium'
    ),
    CostEstimation = case(
        EstimatedMonthlyCost > 0, strcat('[Cost Est.] $', round(EstimatedMonthlyCost, 2), ' per month'),
        '[Cost Est.] No additional cost'
    )
| project 

    Resource=name,
    SKU=skuName,
    Capacity=skuCapacity,
    ZoneSupported=zoneSupported,
    ZoneConfigured=zoneRedundant,
    AvailabilityZones=tostring(zones),
        ResourceGroup=resourceGroup,
     Recommendation,
         ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    CostEstimation,
    SubscriptionId=subscriptionId,
    Location=location
| order by Resource asc","size":0,"title":"Azure API Management 🟢 [Cost Est.]","noDataMessage":"All Azure API Management services have availability zones configured","noDataMessageStyle":3,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"pinnedZone","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}},{"columnMatch":"zoneRedundant","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"success","text":""},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"4","text":""}]}}],"rowLimit":1000},"sortBy":[]},"name":"query-apiManagement-zones-details"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**Note:** Cost based on East US rates (Sep 2025). | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where type =~ 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces'
| where location in~ ({ZonalRegions:value})
| extend resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId,'/resourceGroups/',resourceGroup)
| extend subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId)
| extend skuName = tostring(sku.name)
| extend skuTier = tostring(sku.tier)
| extend zoneRedundantProperty = tobool(properties.zoneRedundant)
| extend zoneRedundant = iff(zoneRedundantProperty == true, true, false)
| where zoneRedundant == "false"
| extend migrationStatus = case(
    zoneRedundant == true, 'Zone redundancy enabled',
    zoneRedundant == false, 'Zone redundancy not enabled - May be eligible for automatic migration',
    'Zone redundancy status unknown'
)
| join kind = innerunique( //Tag filter
    resources
    | extend replaced_tags = replace('{}', 'null', tostring(tags))
    | extend replaced_tags = parse_json(replaced_tags)
    | mv-expand replaced_tags
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(replaced_tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(replaced_tags['{TagName}'])
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | project id
    )
    on id
| extend EstimatedMonthlyCost = 0.0  // No additional cost for zone redundancy
| extend 
    Recommendation = case(
        zoneRedundant == true, 'No action needed - Zone redundancy already enabled',
        zoneRedundant == false, 'Zone redundancy not enabled - May be automatically migrated by Microsoft',
        'Review Service Bus zone redundancy status'
    ),
    ImplementationImpact = case(
        zoneRedundant == true, 'None',
        'High'  // Automatic migration by Microsoft
    ),
    ImplementationComplexity = case(
        zoneRedundant == true, 'None',
        'Low'  // Automatic migration by Microsoft
    ),
    CostEstimation = '🟢 [Cost Est.] No additional cost - Automatic feature'
| project 

    Resource=name,
    SKU=skuName,
    Tier=skuTier,
    ZoneConfigured=zoneRedundant,
    ZoneRedundantProperty=zoneRedundantProperty,
        ResourceGroup=resourceGroup,
        Recommendation,
            ImplementationImpact,
    ImplementationComplexity,
    EstimatedMonthlyCost,
    CostEstimation,
    SubscriptionId=subscriptionId,
    Location=location

    SubscriptionId=subscriptionId,
    Location=location,
    ResourceId=id,
    Tags=tostring(tags)
